img.Width) / 2), thumbRect.Y + ((thumbRect.Height - img.Height) / 2), img.Width, img.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int sourceWidth = img.Width;Di2015NewLine        int sourceHeight = img.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float nPercent = 0;Di2015NewLine        float nPercentW = 0;Di2015NewLine        float nPercentH = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        nPercentW = ((float)thumbRect.Width / (float)sourceWidth);Di2015NewLine        nPercentH = ((float)thumbRect.Height / (float)sourceHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (nPercentH < nPercentW)Di2015NewLine            nPercent = nPercentH;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            nPercent = nPercentW;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int destWidth = (int)(sourceWidth * nPercent);Di2015NewLine        int destHeight = (int)(sourceHeight * nPercent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (destWidth.Equals(0))Di2015NewLine            destWidth = 1;Di2015NewLine        if (destHeight.Equals(0))Di2015NewLine            destHeight = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Rectangle retRect = new Rectangle(thumbRect.X, thumbRect.Y, destWidth, destHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (retRect.Height < thumbRect.Height)Di2015NewLine            retRect.Y = retRect.Y + Convert.ToInt32(((float)thumbRect.Height - 2191499Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FibClosure{Di2015NewLine    private Func<int>[] formulaCache;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Nth_Fib(int n){Di2015NewLine        if (n <= 2) return n;Di2015NewLine        if(formulaCache == null) formulaCache = new Func<int>[(n + 1)];Di2015NewLine        Func<int> formula = build(n);Di2015NewLine        return formula();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Func<int> build(int n){Di2015NewLine        if (formulaCache[n] == null)Di2015NewLine            formulaCache[n] = () => Nth_Fib(n - 1) + Nth_Fib(n - 2);Di2015NewLine        return formulaCache[n];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2191570Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ComExample {Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var wrapper = new ReleaseWrapper())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var baz = wrapper.Add(Di2015NewLine                () => new Foo().Bar.Baz);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(baz.Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ReleaseWrapper : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<object> objects = new List<object>();Di2015NewLine    public T Add<T>(Expression<Func<T>> func)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (T)Walk(func.Body);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    object Walk(Expression expr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object obj = WalkImpl(expr);Di2015NewLine        if (obj != null && Marshal.IsComObject(obj) && !objects.Contains(obj)) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            objects.Add(obj);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return obj;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    object[] Walk(IEnumerable<Expression> args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (args == null) return null;Di2015NewLine        return args.Select(arg => Walk(arg)).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    object WalkImpl(Expression expr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (expr.NodeType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Constant:Di2015NewLine                return ((ConstantExpression)expr).Value;Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.New:Di2015NewLine                NewExpression ne = (NewExpression)expr;Di2015NewLine                return ne.Constructor.Invoke(Walk(ne.Arguments));Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.MemberAccess:Di2015NewLine                MemberExpression me = (MemberExpression)expr;Di2015NewLine                object target = Walk(me.Expression);Di2015NewLine                switch (me.Member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case MemberTypes.Field:Di2015NewLine                        return ((FieldInfo)me.Member).GetValue(target);Di2015NewLine                    case MemberTypes.Property:Di2015NewLine                        return ((PropertyInfo)me.Member).GetValue(target, null);Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Call:Di2015NewLine                MethodCallExpression mce = (MethodCallExpression)expr;Di2015NewLine                return mce.Method.Invoke(Walk(mce.Object), Walk(mce.Arguments));Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach(object obj in objects) {Di2015NewLine            Marshal.ReleaseComObject(obj);Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine("Released: " + obj);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        objects.Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2192233Di2015UniqueSeparatordelegate void Del(string s);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Hello(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine("  Hello, {0}!", s);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Goodbye(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine("  Goodbye, {0}!", s);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Del a, b, c, d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create the delegate object a that references Di2015NewLine        // the method Hello:Di2015NewLine        a = Hello;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create the delegate object b that references Di2015NewLine        // the method Goodbye:Di2015NewLine        b = Goodbye;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The two delegates, a and b, are composed to form c: Di2015NewLine        c = a + b;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Remove a from the composed delegate, leaving d, Di2015NewLine        // which calls only the method Goodbye:Di2015NewLine        d = c - a;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine("Invoking delegate a:");Di2015NewLine        a("A");Di2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine("Invoking delegate b:");Di2015NewLine        b("B");Di2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine("Invoking delegate c:");Di2015NewLine        c("C");Di2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine("Invoking delegate d:");Di2015NewLine        d("D");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine/* Output:Di2015NewLineInvoking delegate a:Di2015NewLine  Hello, A!Di2015NewLineInvoking delegate b:Di2015NewLine  Goodbye, B!Di2015NewLineInvoking delegate c:Di2015NewLine  Hello, C!Di2015NewLine  Goodbye, C!Di2015NewLineInvoking delegate d:Di2015NewLine  Goodbye, D!Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLine

2204091Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void MoveUp(this TreeNode node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNode parent = node.Parent;Di2015NewLine        TreeView view = node.TreeView;Di2015NewLine        if (parent != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index = parent.Nodes.IndexOf(node);Di2015NewLine            if (index > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                parent.Nodes.RemoveAt(index);Di2015NewLine                parent.Nodes.Insert(index - 1, node);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (node.TreeView.Nodes.Contains(node)) //root nodeDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index = view.Nodes.IndexOf(node);Di2015NewLine            if (index > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                view.Nodes.RemoveAt(index);Di2015NewLine                view.Nodes.Insert(index - 1, node);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void MoveDown(this TreeNode node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNode parent = node.Parent;Di2015NewLine        TreeView view = node.TreeView;Di2015NewLine        if (parent != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index = parent.Nodes.IndexOf(node);Di2015NewLine            if (index < parent.Nodes.Count -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                parent.Nodes.RemoveAt(index);Di2015NewLine                parent.Nodes.Insert(index + 1, node);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (view != null && view.Nodes.Contains(node)) //root nodeDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index = view.Nodes.IndexOf(node);Di2015NewLine            if (index < view.Nodes.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                view.Nodes.RemoveAt(index);Di2015NewLine                view.Nodes.Insert(index + 1, node);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2207411Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ImageManagerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private Dictionary<string, Image> images=Di2015NewLine    new Dictionary<string,Image>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public Image get(string s) {  // blocking call, returns the imageDi2015NewLine    return load(s);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private Image load(string s) {  // internal, thread-safe helperDi2015NewLine    lock(images) {Di2015NewLine      if(!images.ContainsKey(s)) {Di2015NewLine        Image img=// load the image sDi2015NewLine        images.Add(s,img);Di2015NewLine        return img; Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return images[s];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void preload(params string[] imgs) {  // non-blocking preloading callDi2015NewLine    foreach(string img in imgs) { Di2015NewLine      BackgroundWorker bw=new BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLine      bw.DoWork+=(s,e)=>{ load(img); }  // discard the actual image returnDi2015NewLine      bw.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// in your main functionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   ImageManager im=new ImageManager();Di2015NewLine   im.preload("path1", "path2", "path3", "path4"); // non-blocking callDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // then you just request images based on their pathDi2015NewLine   // they'll become available as they are loadedDi2015NewLine   // or if you request an image before it's queued to be loaded asynchronously Di2015NewLine   // it will get loaded synchronously instead, thus with priority because it's neededDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2209176Di2015UniqueSeparator// Hold a list of all the transistions we have done. List<Transition>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Get the transitions for this <see cref="WorkItemType"/>Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="workItemType"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLineprivate static List<Transition> GetTransistions(this WorkItemType workItemType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine out currentTransistions);Di2015NewLine    if (currentTransistions != null)Di2015NewLine        return currentTransistions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get this worktype type as xmlDi2015NewLine newTransistions = new List<Transition>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get the transistions node.Di2015NewLine    XmlNodeList transitionsList = workItemTypeXml.GetElementsByTagName("TRANSITIONS");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // As there is only one transistions item we can just get the firstDi2015NewLine    XmlNode transitions = transitionsList[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Iterate all the transitionsDi2015NewLine    foreach (XmlNode transition in transitions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // save off the transistion Di2015NewLine        newTransistions.Add(new TransitionDi2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    From = transition.Attributes["from"].Value,Di2015NewLine                                    To = transition.Attributes["to"].ValueDi2015NewLine                                });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Save off this transition so we don't do it again if it is needed.Di2015NewLine    _allTransistions.Add(workItemType, newTransistions);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return newTransistions;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TransitionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string To { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string From { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

    }Di2015NewLine        fieldData.Write(boundBytes, 0, boundBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //calculate the total length we expect to sendDi2015NewLine        List<string> files = filename=\\"{1}\\"\\r\\n Content-Type: application/octet-stream\\r\\n\\r\\n";Di2015NewLine        long fileBytes = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (string f in files)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] headerBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(Di2015NewLine                String.Format(headerTemplate, "image", f));Di2015NewLine            FileStream fs = new FileStream(f, FileMode.Open, boundBytes.Length;Di2015NewLine            fs.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        hr.ContentLength = fieldData.Length + fileBytes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stream s files)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] headerBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(Di2015NewLine                String.Format(headerTemplate, "image", f));Di2015NewLine 0;Di2015NewLine            long bytesSoFar = 0;Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[10240];Di2015NewLine            while ((bytesRead = fs.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bytesSoFar += bytesRead;Di2015NewLine                s.Write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine 2212074Di2015UniqueSeparatorbytes[] result = new bytes[first.Length];Di2015NewLinefor(i = 0; i < first.Length; i += 4)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte a1 = first[i];Di2015NewLine    byte a2 = second[i];Di2015NewLine    byte r1 = first[i+1];Di2015NewLine    byte r2 = second[i+1];Di2015NewLine    byte g1 = first[i+2];Di2015NewLine    byte g2 = second[i+2];Di2015NewLine    byte b1 = first[i+3];Di2015NewLine    byte b2 = second[i+3];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte a = a1 + (255 - a1) * a2 / 255;Di2015NewLine    byte r = r1 * a1 / 255 + r2 * (255 - a1) * a2 / 65025;Di2015NewLine    byte g = g1 * a1 / 255 + g2 * (255 - a1) * a2 / 65025;Di2015NewLine    byte b = b1 * a1 / 255 + b2 * (255 - a1) * a2 / 65025;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    result[i] = a;Di2015NewLine    result[i+1] = r;Di2015NewLine    result[i+2] = g;Di2015NewLine    result[i+3] = b;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2212177Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool wordsearch(const char *w, int x, int y, int d) {Di2015NewLine  if (*w == 0) return true; // end of wordDi2015NewLine  if (x<0||y<0||x>=N||y>=N) return false; // out of boundsDi2015NewLine  if (puzzle[y][x] != w[0]) return false; // wrong characterDi2015NewLine  // otherwise scan forwardsDi2015NewLine  return wordsearch(w + 1, x + xd[d], y + yd[d], d); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2212177Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool wordsearch(const char *w, int x, int y) {Di2015NewLine  int d;Di2015NewLine  for (d=0;d<8;d++)Di2015NewLine    if (wordsearch(w, x, y, d)) return true;Di2015NewLine  return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebool wordsearch(const char *w) {Di2015NewLine  int x, y;Di2015NewLine  for (x=0;x<N;x++) for(y=0;y<N;y++) if (wordsearch(w, x, y)) return true;Di2015NewLine  return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2214462Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace SO_ThreadSafeQueueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static int _QueueExceptions;Di2015NewLine        static int _QueueNull;Di2015NewLine        static _ThreadSafeQueueProcessed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static readonly Queue<Guid?> _Queue = new Queue<Guid?>();Di2015NewLine        static readonly ThreadSafeQueue<Guid?> _ThreadSafeQueue = new ThreadSafeQueue<Guid?>();Di2015NewLine        static readonly Random _Random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const int Expected = 10000000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Clear();Di2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(0, 0);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Creating queues...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < Expected; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Guid guid = Guid.NewGuid();Di2015NewLine                _Queue.Enqueue(guid);Di2015NewLine                _ThreadSafeQueue.Enqueue(guid);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(0, 0);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Processing queues...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(ProcessQueue);Di2015NewLine                ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(ProcessThreadSafeQueue);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int progress = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (_Queue.Count > 0 || _ThreadSafeQueue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.SetCursorPosition(0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                switch (progress)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case 0:Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine("Processing queues... |");Di2015NewLine                            progress = 1;Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    case 1:Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine("Processing queues... /");Di2015NewLine                            progress = 2;Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    case 2:Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine("Processing queues... -");Di2015NewLine                            progress = 3;Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    case 3:Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine("Processing queues... \\\\");Di2015NewLine                            progress = 0;Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(200);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(0, 0);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Finished processing queues...");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\r\\nQueue Count:           {0} Processed: {1, " + Expected.ToString().Length + "} Exceptions: {2,4} Null: {3}", _Queue.Count, _QueueProcessed, _QueueExceptions, _QueueNull);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("ThreadSafeQueue Count: {0} Processed: {1, " + Expected.ToString().Length + "} Exceptions: {2,4} Null: {3}", _ThreadSafeQueue.Count, _ThreadSafeQueueProcessed, _ThreadSafeQueueExceptions, _ThreadSafeQueueNull);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\r\\nPress any key...");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void ProcessQueue(object nothing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (_Queue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Guid? currentItem = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    currentItem = _Queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Interlocked.Increment(ref _QueueExceptions);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (currentItem != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Interlocked.Increment(ref _QueueProcessed);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Interlocked.Increment(ref _QueueNull);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(_Random.Next(1, 10)); // Simulate different workload timesDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void ProcessThreadSafeQueue(object nothing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (_ThreadSafeQueue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Guid? currentItem = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    currentItem = _ThreadSafeQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Interlocked.Increment(ref _ThreadSafeQueueExceptions);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (currentItem != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Interlocked.Increment(ref _ThreadSafeQueueProcessed);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Interlocked.Increment(ref _ThreadSafeQueueNull);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(_Random.Next(1, 10)); // Simulate different workload timesDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Represents a thread safe <see cref="Queue{T}"/>Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLine        public class ThreadSafeQueue<T> : Queue<T>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            #region Private FieldsDi2015NewLine            private readonly object _LockObject = new object();Di2015NewLine            #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #region Public PropertiesDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Gets the number of elements contained in the <see cref="ThreadSafeQueue{T}"/>Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            public new int CountDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                getDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int returnValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    lock (_LockObject)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        returnValue = base.Count;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return returnValue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #region Public MethodsDi2015NewLine            ///           {Di2015NewLine                lock (_LockObject)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    base.Clear();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                lock (_LockObject)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    returnValue = base.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 2219512Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PrimeGeneratorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<int> GeneratePrimes(int maxValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (maxValue < 2)Di2015NewLine            return Enumerable.Empty<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool[] primes = new bool[maxValue + 1];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 2; i <= maxValue; i++)Di2015NewLine            primes[i] = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 2; i < Math.Sqrt(maxValue + 1) + 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (primes[i])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int j = 2 * i; j <= maxValue; j += i)Di2015NewLine                    primes[j] = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Range(2, maxValue - 1).Where(i => primes[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2228594Di2015UniqueSeparatorC#.NET
2228594Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected string get_batch_id(string session_id, string message_body)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Declare a WebClient.Di2015NewLine    WebClient client = new WebClient();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add a User Agent Header.Di2015NewLine    client.Headers.Add("user-agent", "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 6.0; Windows NT 5.2; .NET CLR1.0.3705;)");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the session_id to the Query String.Di2015NewLine    client.QueryString.Add("session_id", session_id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the template to the Query String.Di2015NewLine    client.QueryString.Add("template", message_body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the callback to the Query String.Di2015NewLine    client.QueryString.Add("callback", "3");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the deliv_ack to the Query String.Di2015NewLine    client.QueryString.Add("deliv_ack", "1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Declare the baseurl.Di2015NewLine    string baseurl = "http://api.clickatell.com/http_batch/startbatch";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Open the baseurl.Di2015NewLine    Stream data = client.OpenRead(baseurl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Declare and instantiate a StreamReader to retrieve the results of executing the startbatch command.Di2015NewLine    StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Parse and split the returned string into the returned_strings array.Di2015NewLine    string[] returned_strings = reader.ReadToEnd().Split(' ');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Retrieve the batch_id from the (second element of the) returned_strings array.Di2015NewLine    string batch_id = returned_strings[1].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Close the Stream.Di2015NewLine    data.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Close the Reader.Di2015NewLine    reader.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return the batch_id.Di2015NewLine    return (batch_id);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

elementCount <= 6; elementCount++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var keyValues = Enumerable.Range(0, (Int32)Math.Pow(10, elementCount))Di2015NewLine                    .Select(i => new HeapKey(Guid.NewGuid(), rnd.Next(0, 10)))Di2015NewLine                    .ToDictionary(k => k);Di2015NewLine                var heap = new SortedDictionary<HeapKey, HeapKey>(keyValues);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _compareCount = 0;Di2015NewLine                _enableCompareCount = true;Di2015NewLine                var min = heap.First().Key;Di2015NewLine                _enableCompareCount = false;Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Element count: {0}; Compare count for getMinElement: {1}",Di2015NewLine                                  (Int32)Math.Pow(10, elementCount),Di2015NewLine                                  _compareCount);   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _compareCount = 0;Di2015NewLine                _enableCompareCount = true;Di2015NewLine                heap.Remove(min);Di2015NewLine                _enableCompareCount = false;Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Element count: {0}; Compare count for deleteMinElement: {1}", Di2015NewLine                                  (Int32)Math.Pow(10, elementCount),  Di2015NewLine                                  _compareCount);   Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private class HeapKey : IComparable<HeapKey>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public HeapKey(Guid id, Int32 value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Id = id;Di2015NewLine                Value = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public Guid Id { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine            public Int32 Value { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public int CompareTo(HeapKey other)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_enableCompareCount)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ++_compareCount;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (other == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentNullException("other");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var result = Value.CompareTo(other.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return result == 0 ? Id.CompareTo(other.Id) : result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2233386Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TestARPDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private StringBuilder sbRedirectedOutput = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    public string OutputDataDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.sbRedirectedOutput.ToString(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Run()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo ps = new System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo();Di2015NewLine        ps.FileName = "arp";Di2015NewLine        ps.ErrorDialog = false;Di2015NewLine        ps.Arguments = "-a";Di2015NewLine        ps.CreateNoWindow = true;Di2015NewLine        ps.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine        ps.RedirectStandardOutput = true;Di2015NewLine        ps.WindowStyle = System.Diagnostics.ProcessWindowStyle.Hidden;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (System.Diagnostics.Process proc = new System.Diagnostics.Process())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            proc.StartInfo = ps;Di2015NewLine            proc.Exited += new EventHandler(proc_Exited);Di2015NewLine            proc.OutputDataReceived += new System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler(proc_OutputDataReceived);Di2015NewLine            proc.Start();Di2015NewLine            proc.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLine            proc.BeginOutputReadLine();Di2015NewLine            while (!proc.HasExited) ;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void proc_Exited(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine("proc_Exited: Process Ended");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void proc_OutputDataReceived(object sender, System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.Data != null) this.sbRedirectedOutput.Append(e.Data + Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine        //System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine("proc_OutputDataReceived: Data: " + e.Data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2234794Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static unsafe FileVersionInfo GetVersionInfo(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // ...Di2015NewLine    int fileVersionInfoSize = UnsafeNativeMethods.GetFileVersionInfoSize(fileName, out num);Di2015NewLine    FileVersionInfo info = new FileVersionInfo(fileName);Di2015NewLine    if (fileVersionInfoSize != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[fileVersionInfoSize];Di2015NewLine        fixed (byte* numRef = buffer)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IntPtr handle = new IntPtr((void*) numRef);Di2015NewLine            if (!UnsafeNativeMethods.GetFileVersionInfo(fileName, 0, fileVersionInfoSize, new HandleRef(null, handle)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return info;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            int varEntry = GetVarEntry(handle);Di2015NewLine            if (!info.GetVersionInfoForCodePage(handle, ConvertTo8DigitHex(varEntry)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int[] numArray = new int[] { 0x40904b0, 0x40904e4, 0x4090000 };Di2015NewLine                foreach (int num4 in numArray)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if ((num4 != varEntry) && info.GetVersionInfoForCodePage(handle, ConvertTo8DigitHex(num4)))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return info;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return info;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2235211Di2015UniqueSeparator        public DateTime RetrieveLinkerTimestamp(string filePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int PeHeaderOffset = 60;Di2015NewLine        const int LinkerTimestampOffset = 8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] b = new byte[2048];Di2015NewLine        Stream s = Stream.Null;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            s = new FileStream(filePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine            s.Read(b, 0, 2048);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((s != null)) s.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int i = BitConverter.ToInt32(b, PeHeaderOffset);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int SecondsSince1970 = BitConverter.ToInt32(b, i + LinkerTimestampOffset);Di2015NewLine        DateTime dt = new DateTime(1970, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        dt = dt.AddSeconds(SecondsSince1970);Di2015NewLine        dt = dt.AddHours(TimeZone.CurrentTimeZone.GetUtcOffset(dt).Hours);Di2015NewLine        return dt;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2237321Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic decimal IncrementLastDigit(decimal value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[] bits1 = decimal.GetBits(value);Di2015NewLine    int saved = bits1[3];Di2015NewLine    bits1[3] = 0;   // Set scaling to 0, remove signDi2015NewLine    int[] bits2 = decimal.GetBits(new decimal(bits1) + 1);Di2015NewLine    bits2[3] = saved; // Restore original scaling and signDi2015NewLine    return new decimal(bits2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2237321Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic decimal GetScaledOne(decimal value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[] bits = decimal.GetBits(value);Di2015NewLine    // Generate a value +1, scaled using the same scaling factor as the input valueDi2015NewLine    bits[0] = 1;Di2015NewLine    bits[1] = 0;Di2015NewLine    bits[2] = 0;Di2015NewLine    bits[3] = bits[3] & 0x00FF0000;Di2015NewLine    return new decimal(bits);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic decimal IncrementLastDigit(decimal value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return value < 0 ? value - GetScaledOne(value) : value + GetScaledOne(value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2241243Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<string> ShortestPath(string fromState, string toState, Transition[] currentTransitions) {Di2015NewLine    var map = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine    var edges = currentTransitions.ToDictionary(i => i.From, i => i.To);Di2015NewLine    var q = new Queue<string>(); Di2015NewLine    map.Add(fromState, null);Di2015NewLine    q.Enqueue(fromState);Di2015NewLine    while (q.Count > 0) {Di2015NewLine        var current = q.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var s in edges[current]) {Di2015NewLine            if (!map.ContainsKey(s)) {Di2015NewLine                map.Add(s, current);Di2015NewLine                if (s == toState) {Di2015NewLine                    var result = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLine                    var thisNode = s;Di2015NewLine                    do {Di2015NewLine                        result.Push(thisNode);Di2015NewLine                        thisNode = map[thisNode];Di2015NewLine                    } while (thisNode != fromState);Di2015NewLine                    while (result.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                        yield return result.Pop();Di2015NewLine                    yield break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                q.Enqueue(s);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // no path existsDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2242321Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string Rewrite(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    var stack = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLine    string[] lines = input.Split('\\n');Di2015NewLine    foreach (var s in lines)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (s.Contains("{") || s.Contains("="))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(s.Replace("{", String.Empty).Trim());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (s.Contains("="))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(string.Join(".", stack.Reverse().ToArray()));Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (s.Contains("}") || s.Contains("="))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2242594Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static object[] Merge(object[] first, object[] second) {Di2015NewLine    if (first == null) {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("first");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (second == null) {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("second");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Type firstType = first.GetType();Di2015NewLine    Type secondType = second.GetType();Di2015NewLine    if (firstType != secondType) {Di2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException("type mismatch");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Hashtable table = new Hashtable();Di2015NewLine    ArrayList items = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLine    NewMethod(first, table, items);Di2015NewLine    NewMethod(second, table, items);Di2015NewLine    return (object[])items.ToArray(firstType.GetElementType());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void NewMethod(object[] array, Hashtable table, ArrayList items) {Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        object item = array[i];Di2015NewLine        if (!table.Contains(item)) {Di2015NewLine            table.Add(item, 1);Di2015NewLine            items.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2251648Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PartitionList<T> : IList<T> {Di2015NewLine    private readonly int _maxCountPerList;Di2015NewLine    private readonly IList<IList<T>> _lists;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PartitionList(int maxCountPerList) {Di2015NewLine        _maxCountPerList = maxCountPerList;Di2015NewLine        _lists = new List<IList<T>> { new List<T>() };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator() {Di2015NewLine        return _lists.SelectMany(list => list).GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() {Di2015NewLine        return GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(T item) {Di2015NewLine        var lastList = _lists[_lists.Count - 1];Di2015NewLine        if (lastList.Count == _maxCountPerList) {Di2015NewLine            lastList = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine            _lists.Add(lastList);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        lastList.Add(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Clear() {Di2015NewLine        while (_lists.Count > 1) _lists.RemoveAt(1);Di2015NewLine        _lists[0].Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Contains(T item) {Di2015NewLine        return _lists.Any(sublist => sublist.Contains(item));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void CopyTo(T[] array, int arrayIndex) {Di2015NewLine        // HomeworkDi2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Remove(T item) {Di2015NewLine        // Evil, Linq with sideeffectsDi2015NewLine        return _lists.Any(sublist => sublist.Remove(item));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Count {Di2015NewLine        get { return _lists.Sum(subList => subList.Count); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsReadOnly {Di2015NewLine        get { return false; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int IndexOf(T item) {Di2015NewLine        int index = _lists.Select((subList, i) => subList.IndexOf(item) * i).Max();Di2015NewLine        return (index > -1) ? index : -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Insert(int index, T item) {Di2015NewLine        // HomeworkDi2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RemoveAt(int index) {Di2015NewLine        // HomeworkDi2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T this[int index] {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            if (index >= _lists.Sum(subList => subList.Count)) {Di2015NewLine                throw new IndexOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var list = _lists[index / _maxCountPerList];Di2015NewLine            return list[index % _maxCountPerList];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        set {Di2015NewLine            if (index >= _lists.Sum(subList => subList.Count)) {Di2015NewLine                throw new IndexOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var list = _lists[index / _maxCountPerList];Di2015NewLine            list[index % _maxCountPerList] = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2252418Di2015UniqueSeparator protected override void OnPaint(PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnPaint(e);Di2015NewLine        Graphics dc = e.Graphics;Di2015NewLine        dc.ScaleTransform(1.0F, 1.0F);Di2015NewLine        Size scrollOffset = new Size(AutoScrollPosition);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int start_x = Math.Min(matrix_x_size, Di2015NewLine                             (e.ClipRectangle.Left - scrollOffset.Width) / 256);Di2015NewLine        int start_y = Math.Min(matrix_y_size, Di2015NewLine                             (e.ClipRectangle.Top - scrollOffset.Height) / 256);Di2015NewLine        int end_x = Math.Min(matrix_x_size, Di2015NewLine                        (e.ClipRectangle.Right - scrollOffset.Width + 255) / 256);Di2015NewLine        int end_y = Math.Min(matrix_y_size, Di2015NewLine                      (e.ClipRectangle.Bottom - scrollOffset.Height + 255) / 256);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // start * contain the first and last tile x/y which are on screen Di2015NewLine        // and which need to be redrawn.Di2015NewLine        // now iterate trough all tiles which need an update Di2015NewLine        for (int y = start_y; y < end_y; y++)Di2015NewLine            for (int x = start_x; x < end_x; x++)Di2015NewLine            {  // draw bitmap with gdi+ at calculated position.Di2015NewLine                dc.DrawImage(BmpMatrix[y, x], Di2015NewLine                           new Point(x * 256 + scrollOffset.Width, Di2015NewLine                                     y * 256 + scrollOffset.Height));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2252835Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Start()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool result = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This will enable Perform work to operate in its own threadDi2015NewLine    Action threadAction = new Action(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = PerformWork();Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ThreadStart ts = new ThreadStart(threadAction);Di2015NewLine    Thread t = new Thread(ts);Di2015NewLine    t.Start();Di2015NewLine    Thread.Sleep(2000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Dependent on if ReportWork exited without expcetionsDi2015NewLine    // I want to call ReportSuccess or ReportFailure from this method.Di2015NewLine    // However, I dont want to implement any reporting functionallity (orDi2015NewLine    // as little as possible)Di2015NewLine    // into the deriving classes PerformWork() method. 2258448Di2015UniqueSeparator/*!Di2015NewLine * Project: Salient.DataDi2015NewLine * File   : EnumerableDataReader.csDi2015NewLine * http://spikes.codeplex.comDi2015NewLine *Di2015NewLine * Copyright 2010, Sky SandersDi2015NewLine * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.Di2015NewLine * See LICENSE.TXTDi2015NewLine * Date: Sat Mar 28 2010 Di2015NewLine */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Salient.DataDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates an IDataReader over an instance of IEnumerable<> or IEnumerable.Di2015NewLine    /// Anonymous type arguments are acceptable.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class EnumerableDataReader : ObjectDataReaderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly IEnumerator _enumerator;Di2015NewLine        private readonly Type _type;Di2015NewLine        private object _current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Create an IDataReader over an instance of IEnumerable<>.Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// Note: anonymous type arguments are acceptable.Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// Use other constructor for IEnumerable.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="collection">IEnumerable<>. For IEnumerable use other constructor and specify type.</param>Di2015NewLine        public EnumerableDataReader(IEnumerable collection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // THANKS DANIEL!Di2015NewLine            foreach (Type intface in collection.GetType().GetInterfaces())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (intface.IsGenericType && intface.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof (IEnumerable<>))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _type = intface.GetGenericArguments()[0]; Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_type ==null && collection.GetType().IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _type = collection.GetType().GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_type == null )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine                    "collection must be IEnumerable<>. Use other constructor for IEnumerable and specify type");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SetFields(_type);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _enumerator = collection.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Create an IDataReader over an instance of IEnumerable.Di2015NewLine        /// Use other constructor for IEnumerable<>Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="collection"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="elementType"></param>Di2015NewLine        public EnumerableDataReader(IEnumerable collection, Type elementType)Di2015NewLine            : base(elementType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _type = elementType;Di2015NewLine            _enumerator = collection.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Helper method to create generic lists from anonymous typeDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="type"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static IList ToGenericList(Type type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (IList) Activator.CreateInstance(typeof (List<>).MakeGenericType(new[] {type}));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Return the value of the specified field.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Di2015NewLine        /// The <see cref="T:System.Object"/> which will contain the field value upon return.Di2015NewLine        /// </returns>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="i">The index of the field to find. Di2015NewLine        /// </param><exception cref="T:System.IndexOutOfRangeException">The index passed was outside the range of 0 through <see cref="P:System.Data.IDataRecord.FieldCount"/>. Di2015NewLine        /// </exception><filterpriority>2</filterpriority>Di2015NewLine        public override object GetValue(int i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i < 0 || i >= Fields.Count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new IndexOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Fields[i].Getter(_current);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Advances the <see cref="T:System.Data.IDataReader"/> to the next record.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Di2015NewLine        /// true if there are more rows; otherwise, false.Di2015NewLine        /// </returns>Di2015NewLine        /// <filterpriority>2</filterpriority>Di2015NewLine        public override bool Read()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool returnValue = _enumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            _current = returnValue ? _enumerator.Current : _type.IsValueType ? Activator.CreateInstance(_type) : null;Di2015NewLine            return returnValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2258448Di2015UniqueSeparator// <copyright project="Salient.Data" file="ObjectDataReader.cs" company="Sky Sanders">Di2015NewLine// This source is a Public Domain Dedication.Di2015NewLine// Please see http://spikes.codeplex.com/ for details.   Di2015NewLine// Attribution is appreciatedDi2015NewLine// </copyright> Di2015NewLine// <version>1.0</version>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineusing Salient.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Salient.DataDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public abstract class ObjectDataReader : IDataReaderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        protected bool Closed;Di2015NewLine        protected IList<DynamicProperties.Property> Fields;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected ObjectDataReader()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected ObjectDataReader(Type elementType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SetFields(elementType);Di2015NewLine            Closed = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region IDataReader MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public abstract object GetValue(int i);Di2015NewLine        public abstract bool Read();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Implementation of IDataRecordDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int FieldCountDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return Fields.Count; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public virtual int GetOrdinal(string name)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < Fields.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (Fields[i].Info.Name == name)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return i;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            throw new IndexOutOfRangeException("name");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object IDataRecord.this[int i]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return GetValue(i); 2258448Di2015UniqueSeparator// <copyright project="Salient.Reflection" file="DynamicProperties.cs" company="Sky Sanders">Di2015NewLine// This source is a Public Domain Dedication.Di2015NewLine// Please see http://spikes.codeplex.com/ for details.   Di2015NewLine// Attribution is appreciatedDi2015NewLine// </copyright> Di2015NewLine// <version>1.0</version>Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection.Emit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Salient.ReflectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets IL setters and getters for a property.Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// started with http://jachman.wordpress.com/2006/08/22/2000-faster-using-dynamic-method-calls/Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static class DynamicPropertiesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region DelegatesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public delegate object GenericGetter(object target);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public delegate void GenericSetter(object target, object value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IList<Property> CreatePropertyMethods(Type T)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var returnValue = new List<Property>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyInfo prop in T.GetProperties())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                returnValue.Add(new Property(prop));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return returnValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IList<Property> CreatePropertyMethods<T>()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var returnValue = new List<Property>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyInfo prop in typeof (T).GetProperties())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                returnValue.Add(new Property(prop));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return returnValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Creates a dynamic setter for the propertyDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="propertyInfo"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static GenericSetter CreateSetMethod(PropertyInfo propertyInfo)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /*Di2015NewLine            * If there's no setter return nullDi2015NewLine            */Di2015NewLine            MethodInfo setMethod = propertyInfo.GetSetMethod();Di2015NewLine            if (setMethod == null)Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /*Di2015NewLine            * Create the dynamic methodDi2015NewLine            */Di2015NewLine            var arguments = new Type[2];Di2015NewLine            arguments[0] = arguments[1] = typeof (object);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var setter = new DynamicMethod(Di2015NewLine                String.Concat("_Set", propertyInfo.Name, "_"),Di2015NewLine                typeof (void), arguments, propertyInfo.DeclaringType);Di2015NewLine            ILGenerator generator = setter.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine            generator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine            generator.Emit(OpCodes.Castclass, propertyInfo.DeclaringType);Di2015NewLine            generator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (propertyInfo.PropertyType.IsClass)Di2015NewLine                generator.Emit(OpCodes.Castclass, propertyInfo.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                generator.Emit(OpCodes.Unbox_Any, propertyInfo.PropertyType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            generator.EmitCall(OpCodes.Callvirt, setMethod, null);Di2015NewLine            generator.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /*Di2015NewLine            * Create the delegate and return itDi2015NewLine            */Di2015NewLine            return (GenericSetter) setter.CreateDelegate(typeof (GenericSetter));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Creates a dynamic getter for the propertyDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="propertyInfo"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static GenericGetter CreateGetMethod(PropertyInfo propertyInfo)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /*Di2015NewLine            * If there's no getter return nullDi2015NewLine            */Di2015NewLine            MethodInfo getMethod = propertyInfo.GetGetMethod();Di2015NewLine            if (getMethod == null)Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /*Di2015NewLine            * Create the dynamic methodDi2015NewLine            */Di2015NewLine            var arguments = new Type[1];Di2015NewLine            arguments[0] = typeof (object);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var getter = new DynamicMethod(Di2015NewLine                String.Concat("_Get", propertyInfo.Name, "_"),Di2015NewLine                typeof (object), arguments, propertyInfo.DeclaringType);Di2015NewLine            ILGenerator generator = getter.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine            generator.DeclareLocal(typeof (object));Di2015NewLine            generator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine            generator.Emit(OpCodes.Castclass, propertyInfo.DeclaringType);Di2015NewLine            generator.EmitCall(OpCodes.Callvirt, getMethod, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!propertyInfo.PropertyType.IsClass)Di2015NewLine                generator.Emit(OpCodes.Box, propertyInfo.PropertyType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            generator.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /*Di2015NewLine            * Create the delegate and return itDi2015NewLine            */Di2015NewLine            return (GenericGetter) getter.CreateDelegate(typeof (GenericGetter));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Nested type: PropertyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public class PropertyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public GenericGetter Getter;Di2015NewLine            public PropertyInfo Info;Di2015NewLine            public GenericSetter Setter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public Property(PropertyInfo info)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Info = info;Di2015NewLine                Setter = CreateSetMethod(info);Di2015NewLine                Getter = CreateGetMethod(info);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ///// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///// An expression based Getter getter found in comments. untested.Di2015NewLine        ///// Q: i don't see a reciprocal setter expression?Di2015NewLine 2261488Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection.Emit;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.CompilerServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class DataTableExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Type GetTableType(DataTable DTable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create needed TypeBuilder helpersDi2015NewLine        AppDomain myDomain = Thread.GetDomain();Di2015NewLine        AssemblyName myAsmName = new AssemblyName("Anonymous");Di2015NewLine        AssemblyBuilder myAsmBuilder = myDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(myAsmName, AssemblyBuilderAccess.Run);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ModuleBuilder myModBuilder = myAsmBuilder.DefineDynamicModule(myAsmName.Name);Di2015NewLine        TypeBuilder myTypeBuilder = myModBuilder.DefineType(DTable.TableName, TypeAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (DataColumn col in DTable.Columns) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var PropertyName = col.ColumnName;Di2015NewLine            var PropertyType = col.DataType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            FieldBuilder PropertyFieldBuilder = myTypeBuilder.DefineField("_" + PropertyName.ToLower, PropertyType, FieldAttributes.Private);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PropertyBuilder PBuilder = myTypeBuilder.DefineProperty(PropertyName, PropertyAttributes.HasDefault, col.DataType, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            MethodAttributes getSetAttr = MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.SpecialName | MethodAttributes.HideBySig;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            MethodBuilder getPropertyBuilder = myTypeBuilder.DefineMethod("get" + PropertyName, getSetAttr, col.DataType, Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Constructing IL Code for get and set Methods.Di2015NewLine            ILGenerator GetPropGenerator = getPropertyBuilder.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            GetPropGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine            GetPropGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, PropertyFieldBuilder);Di2015NewLine            GetPropGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            MethodBuilder setPropertyBuulder = myTypeBuilder.DefineMethod("set_" + PropertyName, getSetAttr, null, new Type[] { col.DataType });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ILGenerator SetPropGenerator = setPropertyBuulder.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SetPropGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine            SetPropGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);Di2015NewLine            SetPropGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Stfld, PropertyFieldBuilder);Di2015NewLine            SetPropGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PBuilder.SetGetMethod(getPropertyBuilder);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PBuilder.SetSetMethod(setPropertyBuulder);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ConstructorInfo objCtor = typeof(object).GetConstructor(new Type[-1 + 1]);Di2015NewLine        ConstructorBuilder pointCtor = myTypeBuilder.DefineConstructor(MethodAttributes.Public, CallingConventions.Standard, Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ILGenerator ctorIL = pointCtor.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Constructing IL Code for the Type Constructor.Di2015NewLine        ctorIL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine        ctorIL.Emit(OpCodes.Call, objCtor);Di2015NewLine        ctorIL.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return myTypeBuilder.CreateType();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2265990Di2015UniqueSeparator             Bitmap c = new Bitmap("fromFile");Di2015NewLine             Bitmap d;Di2015NewLine             int x, y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             // Loop through the images pixels to reset color.Di2015NewLine             for (x = 0; x < c.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                 for (y = 0; y < c.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                     Color pixelColor = c.GetPixel(x, y);Di2015NewLine                     Color newColor = Color.FromArgb(pixelColor.R, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine                     c.SetPixel(x, y, newColor); // Now greyscaleDi2015NewLine                 }Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine            d = c;   // d is grayscale version of c  Di2015NewLine
2265990Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap MakeGrayscale3(Bitmap original)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   //create a blank bitmap the same size as originalDi2015NewLine   Bitmap newBitmap = new Bitmap(original.Width, original.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //get a graphics object from the new imageDi2015NewLine   Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(newBitmap);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //create the grayscale ColorMatrixDi2015NewLine   ColorMatrix colorMatrix = new ColorMatrix(Di2015NewLine      new float[][] Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         new float[] {.3f, .3f, .3f, 0, 0},Di2015NewLine         new float[] {.59f, .59f, .59f, 0, 0},Di2015NewLine         new float[] {.11f, .11f, .11f, 0, 0},Di2015NewLine         new float[] {0, 0, 0, 1, 0},Di2015NewLine         new float[] {0, 0, 0, 0, 1}Di2015NewLine      });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //create some image attributesDi2015NewLine   ImageAttributes attributes = new ImageAttributes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //set the color matrix attributeDi2015NewLine   attributes.SetColorMatrix(colorMatrix);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //draw the original image on the new imageDi2015NewLine   //using the grayscale color matrixDi2015NewLine   g.DrawImage(original, new Rectangle(0, 0, original.Width, original.Height),Di2015NewLine      0, 0, original.Width, original.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel, attributes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //dispose the Graphics objectDi2015NewLine   g.Dispose();Di2015NewLine   return newBitmap;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2267264Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring a = "-3.33+44*456/2.2-3"; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring[] ip = new string[25]; Di2015NewLine    int k = 0; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            if (a.Substring(i, 1) == "+" || a.Substring(i, 1) == "-" || a.Substring(i, 1) == "*" || a.Substring(i, 1) == "/" || a.Substring(i, 1) == "^") Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                for (int j = i + 1; j <= a.Length; j++) // a.Length has to be included so the last element gets addedDi2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    // allow the end of the string as an optionDi2015NewLine                    if (j == a.Length || a.Substring(j, 1) == "+" || a.Substring(j, 1) == "-" || a.Substring(j, 1) == "*" || a.Substring(j, 1) == "/" || a.Substring(j, 1) == "^") Di2015NewLine                    { Di2015NewLine                        if (a.Substring(i, 1) == "+" || a.Substring(i, 1) == "-") Di2015NewLine                        { Di2015NewLine                            ip[k] = a.Substring(i, j-i); Di2015NewLine                            k++; Di2015NewLine                        } Di2015NewLine                        else Di2015NewLine                        { Di2015NewLine                            ip[k] = a.Substring(i, 1); Di2015NewLine                            k++; Di2015NewLine                            ip[k] = a.Substring(i + 1, (j -i)-1); Di2015NewLine                            k++; Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        i = j - 1; // i gets incremented in the for loop, so subract 1 hereDi2015NewLine                        break; Di2015NewLine                    } Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine

2270115Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ConventionModelMetadataProvider : DataAnnotationsModelMetadataProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override ModelMetadata CreateMetadata(IEnumerable<Attribute> attributes, Type containerType, Func<object> modelAccessor, Type modelType, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var metadata = base.CreateMetadata(attributes, containerType, modelAccessor, modelType, propertyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HumanizePropertyNamesAsDisplayName(metadata);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (metadata.DisplayName.ToUpper() == "ID")Di2015NewLine            metadata.DisplayName = "Id Number";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return metadata;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void HumanizePropertyNamesAsDisplayName(ModelMetadata metadata)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        metadata.DisplayName = HumanizeCamel((metadata.DisplayName ?? metadata.PropertyName));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string HumanizeCamel(string camelCasedString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (camelCasedString == null)Di2015NewLine            return "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        char last = char.MinValue;Di2015NewLine        foreach (char c in camelCasedString)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (char.IsLower(last) && char.IsUpper(c))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(' ');Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine            last = c;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2270568Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT t.top_level_cat_id, t.category_id, t.post_id, t.post_date Di2015NewLineFROM (Di2015NewLine    SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY top_level.cat_id ORDER BY p.post_id) AS row_num, Di2015NewLine        top_level.cat_id AS top_level_cat_id, Di2015NewLine        child_category.cat_id AS category_id, Di2015NewLine        p.post_id, Di2015NewLine        p.post_dateDi2015NewLine    FROM Di2015NewLine        Post pDi2015NewLine        INNER JOIN Category AS child_category Di2015NewLine        ON child_category.cat_id = p.cat_id  Di2015NewLine        INNER JOIN Category AS top_levelDi2015NewLine        ON top_level.cat_id = child_category.cat_parentDi2015NewLine) AS t Di2015NewLineWHERE t.row_num <= 15Di2015NewLine
2270568Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE TABLE Category (cat_id INT, cat_parent INT);Di2015NewLine--top levelDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO Category VALUES(1, 0);Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Category VALUES(2, 0);Di2015NewLine-- child categoriesDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO Category VALUES(3, 1);Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Category VALUES(4, 1);Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Category VALUES(5, 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE TABLE Post(post_id INT, cat_id INT, post_date DATETIME);Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(1, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(2, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(3, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(4, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(5, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(6, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(7, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(8, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(9, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(10, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(11, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(12, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(13, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(14, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(15, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLine-- these records won't appear Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(16, 3, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(17, 4, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(18, 4, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(19, 5, GETDATE());Di2015NewLineINSERT INTO Post VALUES(20, 5, GETDATE());Di2015NewLine

2271374Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO.Compression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class GZipTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] Compress(byte[] uncompressedBuffer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var gzip = new GZipStream(ms, CompressionMode.Compress, true))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                gzip.Write(uncompressedBuffer, 0, uncompressedBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            byte[] compressedBuffer = ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            return compressedBuffer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static byte[] Decompress(byte[] compressedBuffer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var gzip = new GZipStream(new MemoryStream(compressedBuffer), CompressionMode.Decompress))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] uncompressedBuffer = ReadAllBytes(gzip);Di2015NewLine            return uncompressedBuffer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static byte[] ReadAllBytes(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine        using (var ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int bytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bytesRead = stream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                if (bytesRead > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ms.Write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } while (bytesRead > 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2274764Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RenderUtilDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static Dictionary<Type, object> s_renderers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static RenderUtil()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s_renderers = new Dictionary<Type, object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var type in Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetTypes())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var renderInterface = type.GetInterfaces().FirstOrDefault(Di2015NewLine                i => i.IsGenericType && Di2015NewLine                     i.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(IRenderer<>));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (renderInterface != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                s_renderers.Add(Di2015NewLine                    renderInterface.GetGenericArguments()[0],Di2015NewLine                    Activator.CreateInstance(type));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Render<T>(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IRenderer<T> renderer = null;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // no need to synchronize readonly accessDi2015NewLine            renderer = (IRenderer<T>)s_renderers[item.GetType()];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("No renderer for type " + item.GetType().Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return renderer.Render(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2281255Di2015UniqueSeparatorList a = { 1, 3, 5, 7, 9 }Di2015NewLineList b = { 2, 4, 6, 8, 10 }Di2015NewLineList result = { }Di2015NewLineint i=0, j=0, lastIndex=0Di2015NewLinewhile(i < a.length || j < b.length)Di2015NewLine    // If we're done with a, just gobble up b (but don't add duplicates)Di2015NewLine    if(i >= a.length)Di2015NewLine        if(result[lastIndex] != b[j])Di2015NewLine            result[++lastIndex] = b[j]Di2015NewLine        j++Di2015NewLine        continueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If we're done with b, just gobble up a (but don't add duplicates)Di2015NewLine    if(j >= b.length)Di2015NewLine        if(result[lastIndex] != a[i])Di2015NewLine            result[++lastIndex] = a[i]Di2015NewLine        i++Di2015NewLine        continueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int smallestValDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Choose the smaller of a or bDi2015NewLine    if(a[i] < b[j])Di2015NewLine        smallestVal = a[i++]Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        smallestVal = b[j++]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Don't insert duplicatesDi2015NewLine    if(result[lastIndex] != smallestVal)Di2015NewLine        result[++lastIndex] = smallestValDi2015NewLineend whileDi2015NewLine

2283146Di2015UniqueSeparatorlet s[i] = sum of first i integersDi2015NewLinelet k = number of integers requiredDi2015NewLinelet max = -inf    Di2015NewLinefor ( int i = k; i <= N; ++i )Di2015NewLine  if ( s[i] - s[i - k - 1] > max )Di2015NewLine     max = s[i] - s[i - k - 1]Di2015NewLine

2289206Di2015UniqueSeparatortryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Listen for connections on port 13000Di2015NewLine    TcpListener server = new TcpListener(IPAddress.Loopback, 13000);Di2015NewLine    server.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Read up tp 256 bytes at a time Di2015NewLine    Byte[] bytes = new Byte[256];Di2015NewLine    String data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Enter the listening loop. Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Waiting for a connection... ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Wait for a client connectionDi2015NewLine        TcpClient client = server.AcceptTcpClient();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Connected!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Setup I/O streamsDi2015NewLine        NetworkStream stream = client.GetStream();Di2015NewLine        using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(stream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Loop to receive all the data sent by the client. Di2015NewLine            while ((i = stream.Read(bytes, 0, bytes.Length)) != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Translate data bytes to a ASCII string. Di2015NewLine                data = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetString(bytes, 0, i);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(String.Format("Received: {0}", data));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Process the data sent by the client. Di2015NewLine                data = data.ToUpper();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Send back a response. Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Sending message..");Di2015NewLine                sw.Write(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Add a little extra 'response'Di2015NewLine                sw.Write("<html><body>Hello There!</body></html>");Di2015NewLine                sw.Flush();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Close connection Di2015NewLine        client.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinecatch (SocketException e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("SocketException: {0}", e);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2290653Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IPAddress FindNextFree(this IPAddress address)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IPAddress workingAddress = address;Di2015NewLine        Ping pingSender = new Ping();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] localBytes = workingAddress.GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            localBytes[3]++;Di2015NewLine            if (localBytes[3] > 254)Di2015NewLine                localBytes[3] = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            workingAddress = new IPAddress(localBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (workingAddress.Equals(address))Di2015NewLine                throw new TimeoutException("Could not find free IP address");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PingReply reply = pingSender.Send(workingAddress, 1000);Di2015NewLine            if (reply.Status != IPStatus.Success)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return workingAddress;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
