runat="server">Di2015NewLine    <div>Di2015NewLine        <div class="options">Di2015NewLine            <div style="padding: 5px">Di2015NewLine                <h4>Di2015NewLine                    Quick Options</h4>Di2015NewLine                <asp:Button ID="DefaultOptionsButton" runat="server" Text="Default" OnClick="DefaultOptionsButton_Click" /><br />Di2015NewLine                <asp:Button ID="PrettyPrintButton" runat="server" Text="PrettyPrint" OnClick="PrettyPrintOptionsButton_Click" /><br />Di2015NewLine            </div>Di2015NewLine            <asp:CheckBox ID="CollapseToLiteralCheckBox" runat="server" Text="CollapseToLiteral" />Di2015NewLine            <asp:Label ID="Label13" runat="server" Text=" [?]" ToolTip="convert new Object()? to {}? and new Array()? to [].? And of course, new Array(1,2,3,4,5)? becomes [1,2,3,4,5]? and new Array(foo?)? becomes [foo?]?. However, new Array(5)? does not get minified, because that makes an array with five initial slots  its not the same as [5]."></asp:Label><br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:CheckBox ID="CombineDuplicateLiteralsCheckBox" runat="server" Text="CombineDuplicateLiterals" /><asp:LabelDi2015NewLine                ID="Label12" runat="server" Text=" [?]" ToolTip="combine duplicate literals into local variables."></asp:Label><br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:CheckBox ID="InlineSafeStringsCheckBox" runat="server" Text="InlineSafeStrings" /><asp:LabelDi2015NewLine                ID="Label11" runat="server" Text=" [?]" ToolTip="No documentation found"></asp:Label><br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:CheckBox ID="MacSafariQuirksCheckBox" runat="server" Text="MacSafariQuirks" /><asp:LabelDi2015NewLine                ID="Label10" runat="server" Text=" [?]" ToolTip="There are two quirks that Safari on the Mac (not the PC) needed: throw statements always seem to require a terminating semicolon; and if statements that only contains a single function declaration need to surround that function declaration with curly-braces. Basically, if you want your code to always work in Safari, set this to true. If you dont care about Safari (for instance, in a corporate environment where the browser your users can use is highly restricted), setting this value to false might save a few bytes."></asp:Label><br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:CheckBox ID="MinifyCodeCheckBox" runat="server" Text="MinifyCode" />Di2015NewLine            <asp:Label ID="Label9" runat="server" Text=" [?]" ToolTip="no docs found but is self describing option"></asp:Label><br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:CheckBox ID="PreserveFunctionNamesCheckBox" runat="server" Text="PreserveFunctionNames" /><asp:LabelDi2015NewLine                ID="Label8" runat="server" Text=" [?]" ToolTip="no docs found"></asp:Label><br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:CheckBox ID="RemoveFunctionExpressionNamesCheckBox" runat="server" Text="RemoveFunctionExpressionNames" /><asp:LabelDi2015NewLine                ID="Label7" runat="server" Text=" [?]" ToolTip="no docs found"></asp:Label><br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:CheckBox ID="RemoveUnneededCodeCheckBox" runat="server" Text="RemoveUnneededCode" /><asp:LabelDi2015NewLine                ID="Label6" runat="server" Text=" [?]" ToolTip=" Should be set to true for maximum minification. Removes unreferenced local functions (not global functions, though), unreferenced function parameters, quotes around object literal field names that wont be confused with reserved words, and it does some interesting things with switch statements. For instance, if the default case is empty (just a break), it removes it altogether. If there is no default case, it also removes other empty case statements. It also removes break statements after return statements (unreachable code)."></asp:Label><br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:CheckBox ID="StripDebugStatementsCheckBox" runat="server" Text="StripDebugStatements" />Di2015NewLine            <asp:Label ID="Label5" runat="server" Text=" [?]" ToolTip="removes debugger? statements, any calls into certain namespaces like $Debug, Debug, Web.Debug or Msn.Debug. also strips calls to the WAssert function."></asp:Label>Di2015NewLine            <br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:Label ID="OutputModeLabel" runat="server" Text="OutputMode"></asp:Label>Di2015NewLine            <asp:Label ID="Label4" runat="server" Text=" [?]" ToolTip="SingleLine minifies everything to a single line. MultipleLines breaks the minified code into multiple lines for easier reading (wont drive you insane trying to debug a single line). The only difference between the two outputs is whitespace. (see also: IndentSize)."></asp:Label>Di2015NewLine            <br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:DropDownList ID="OutputModeDropDownList" runat="server">Di2015NewLine                <asp:ListItem Value=" SingleLine"> SingleLine</asp:ListItem>Di2015NewLine                <asp:ListItem Value="MultipleLines">MultipleLines</asp:ListItem>Di2015NewLine            </asp:DropDownList>Di2015NewLine            <br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:Label ID="LocalRenamingLabel" runat="server" Text="LocalRenaming"></asp:Label>Di2015NewLine            <asp:Label ID="Label2" runat="server" Text=" [?]" ToolTip=" renaming of locals. There are a couple settings: KeepAll is the default and doesnt rename variables or functions at all. CrunchAll renames everything it can. In between there is KeepLocalizationVars, which renames everything it can except for variables starting with L_. Those are left as-is so localization efforts can continue on the minified code."></asp:Label>Di2015NewLine            <br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:DropDownList ID="LocalRenamingDropDownList" runat="server">Di2015NewLine                <asp:ListItem>KeepAll</asp:ListItem>Di2015NewLine                <asp:ListItem>KeepLocalizationVars</asp:ListItem>Di2015NewLine                <asp:ListItem>CrunchAll</asp:ListItem>Di2015NewLine            </asp:DropDownList>Di2015NewLine            <br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:Label ID="EvalTreatmentLabel" runat="server" Text="EvalTreatment" AssociatedControlID="EvalTreatmentDropDownList"></asp:Label>Di2015NewLine            <asp:Label ID="Label1" runat="server" Text=" [?]" ToolTip="Normally an eval statement can contain anything, including references to local variables and functions. If it is expected to do so, when the tool encounters an eval statement, that scope and all parent scopes cannot take advantage of local variable and function renaming because things could break when the eval is evaluated and the references are looked up. To reduce the amount of resulting minification but make sure that all possible references in evaluated code will hold true, use the MakeAllSafe value. However, sometimes the developer knows that hes not referencing local variables in his eval (like when only evaluating JSON objects), and this switch can be set to Ignore to make sure you get the maximum reduction in resulting code size. Or alternatively, if the developer knows the code being evaluated will only access local variables and functions in the current scope and nowhere else, the MakeImmediateSafe value can be specified and all parent scopes will still rename their locals. Very dangerous setting; should only be used when you are certain of all possible behavior of evaluated code."></asp:Label><br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:DropDownList ID="EvalTreatmentDropDownList" runat="server">Di2015NewLine                <asp:ListItem>Ignore</asp:ListItem>Di2015NewLine                <asp:ListItem>MakeImmediateSafe</asp:ListItem>Di2015NewLine                <asp:ListItem>MakeAllSafe</asp:ListItem>Di2015NewLine            </asp:DropDownList>Di2015NewLine            <br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:Label ID="IndentSizeLabel" runat="server" Text="IndentSize"></asp:Label>Di2015NewLine            <asp:Label ID="Label3" runat="server" Text=" [?]" ToolTip=" for the multi-line output feature, how many spaces to use when indenting a block (see OutputMode)."></asp:Label>Di2015NewLine            <br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:TextBox ID="IndentSizeTextBox" runat="server"></asp:TextBox>Di2015NewLine            <br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:Button ID="Button1" runat="server" OnClick="Button1_Click" Text="GO" /><br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:Label ID="ResultsLabel" runat="server" Text=" " CssClass="results"></asp:Label>Di2015NewLine        </div>Di2015NewLine        <div class="inout">Di2015NewLine            <asp:TextBox ID="InputTextBox" runat="server" TextMode="MultiLine" CssClass="text textIn"></asp:TextBox><br />Di2015NewLine            <asp:TextBox ID="OutputTextBox" runat="server" TextMode="MultiLine" CssClass="text textOut"></asp:TextBox>Di2015NewLine        </div>Di2015NewLine    </div>Di2015NewLine    </form>Di2015NewLine</body>Di2015NewLine</html>Di2015NewLine

2293757Di2015UniqueSeparator        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Does a simple convert to display an Xml document in HTML.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="xmlString"></param>Di2015NewLine    private static string ConvertXmlToHtml(string xmlString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder html = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        html.AppendLine("<HTML>");Di2015NewLine        html.AppendLine("<HEAD><TITLE>Xml Document</TITLE></HEAD>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        doc.LoadXml(xmlString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        html.AppendLine(ConvertXmlElementToHTML(1, doc.DocumentElement));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        html.AppendLine("</HTML>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return html.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Converts an XML element (and all of its children) to HTML.Di2015NewLine    /// This is a recursive method.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="element"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static string ConvertXmlElementToHTML(int level, XmlNode element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int padding = level; // padding (cm == level).Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder returnHTML = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        if (element is XmlElement)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Formatting for symbols to simplify code below.Di2015NewLine            string close_bracket = "<SPAN style=\\"color: blue\\">></SPAN>";Di2015NewLine            string close_bracket_no_children = "<SPAN style=\\"color: blue\\"> /></SPAN>";Di2015NewLine            string open_bracket = "<SPAN style=\\"color: blue\\"><</SPAN>";Di2015NewLine            string open_bracket_end_el = "<SPAN style=\\"color: blue\\"></</SPAN>";Di2015NewLine            string el_name = "<SPAN style=\\"color: brown\\">" + element.Name + "</SPAN>";Di2015NewLine            string quote = "<SPAN style=\\"color: blue\\">\\"</SPAN>";Di2015NewLine            string equals_sign = "<SPAN style=\\"color: blue\\">=</SPAN>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Open Element.Di2015NewLine            returnHTML.AppendLine("<DIV style=\\"margin-left: " + padding + "cm\\">" + open_bracket + el_name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Print element attributes.Di2015NewLine            foreach(XmlAttribute att in element.Attributes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                returnHTML.AppendLine(" <SPAN style=\\"color: brown\\">" + att.Name + "</SPAN>" + equals_sign + quote + "<SPAN style=\\"color: black; text-weight: bold\\">" + att.Value + "</SPAN>" + quote);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If no children, we end the element here with a '/ >'Di2015NewLine            // otherwise, we close the element and start to write children '>'Di2015NewLine            if (element.ChildNodes.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                returnHTML.AppendLine(close_bracket_no_children + "</DIV>");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                returnHTML.AppendLine(close_bracket + "</DIV>");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Print Children. (Recursive call). Note location is IMPORTANT: we need child elementsDi2015NewLine            // to print after the element is opened and before the element is closed.Di2015NewLine            foreach (XmlNode child in element.ChildNodes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                returnHTML.AppendLine(ConvertXmlElementToHTML(level + 1, child));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If we have printed child elements, we need to print a closing element tag.Di2015NewLine            if (element.ChildNodes.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                returnHTML.AppendLine("<DIV style=\\"margin-left: " + padding + "cm\\">" + open_bracket_end_el + el_name + close_bracket + "</DIV>");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return a string of HTML that will display elements at this level and below (child nodes).Di2015NewLine        return returnHTML.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2294834Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate String longestCommonWord(String s1, String s2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        String[] seperators = new String[] { " ", ",", ".", "!", "?", ";" };Di2015NewLine        var result = from w1 in s1.Split(seperators, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries)Di2015NewLine                     where (from w2 in s2.Split(seperators, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries)Di2015NewLine                            where w2 == w1Di2015NewLine                            select w2).Count() > 0Di2015NewLine                     orderby w1.Length descendingDi2015NewLine                     select w1;Di2015NewLine        if (result.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return result.First();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2297371Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[] files;Di2015NewLinestring[] folders;Di2015NewLineWindowsIdentity id = (WindowsIdentity)User.Identity;Di2015NewLineusing (System.Security.Principal.WindowsImpersonationContext context = id.Impersonate())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    files = Directory.GetFiles(RootDir);Di2015NewLine    folders = Directory.GetDirectories(RootDir);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string file in files)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FileInfo fi = new FileInfo(file);Di2015NewLine        FileSecurity fs = null;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fs = fi.GetAccessControl(AccessControlSections.Access);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (UnauthorizedAccessException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            goto Next;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (FileSystemAccessRule rule in fs.GetAccessRules(true, true, typeof(System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (id.User.CompareTo(rule.IdentityReference as SecurityIdentifier) == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if(rule.AccessControlType.ToString() == "Deny" &&Di2015NewLine                    rule.FileSystemRights.ToString().Contains("ReadData"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    goto Next;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Response.Write(file + " " + fi.Length + "<br />");Di2015NewLine        // next in sequence. label for gotoDi2015NewLine        Next: ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    context.Undo();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2299152Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Func<string, T> CreateFunc<T>()Di2015NewLine    where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var properties = typeof(T).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.SetProperty);Di2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(string),"o");Di2015NewLine    var constructorInfo = typeof(T).GetConstructor(new Type[] { });Di2015NewLine    List<MemberBinding> bindings = new List<MemberBinding>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var property in properties)Di2015NewLine        bindings.Add(Expression.Bind(property, param));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var memberInit = Expression.MemberInit(Expression.New(constructorInfo), bindings);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var func = Expression.Lambda<Func<string, T>>(memberInit, new ParameterExpression[] {param}).Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return func;            Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2307792Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte interpolate(byte a, byte b, double p)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (byte)(a * (1 - p) + b * p);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void trackBar1_Scroll(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int v = trackBar1.Value;Di2015NewLine        BackColor = getColor(v);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Color getColor(int v)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SortedDictionary<int, Color> d = new SortedDictionary<int, Color>();Di2015NewLine        d.Add(0, Color.Blue);Di2015NewLine        d.Add(100, Color.Green);Di2015NewLine        d.Add(200, Color.Yellow);Di2015NewLine        d.Add(300, Color.Orange);Di2015NewLine        d.Add(400, Color.Red);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        KeyValuePair<int, Color> kvp_previous = new KeyValuePair<int,Color>(-1, Color.Black);Di2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<int, Color> kvp in d)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (kvp.Key > v)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                double p = (v - kvp_previous.Key) / (double)(kvp.Key - kvp_previous.Key);Di2015NewLine                Color a = kvp_previous.Value;Di2015NewLine                Color b = kvp.Value;Di2015NewLine                Color c = Color.FromArgb(Di2015NewLine                    interpolate(a.R, b.R, p),Di2015NewLine                    interpolate(a.G, b.G, p),Di2015NewLine                    interpolate(a.B, b.B, p));Di2015NewLine                return c;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            kvp_previous = kvp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Color.Black;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2307899Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PartitionedXmlSerializer<TObj>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly int _fileSizeLimit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PartitionedXmlSerializer(int fileSizeLimit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _fileSizeLimit = fileSizeLimit;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Serialize(string filenameBase, TObj obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var memoryStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // serialize the object in the memory streamDi2015NewLine            using (var xmlWriter = XmlWriter.Create(memoryStream))Di2015NewLine                new XmlSerializer(typeof(TObj))Di2015NewLine                    .Serialize(xmlWriter, obj);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            memoryStream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var extensionFormat = GetExtensionFormat(memoryStream.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var buffer = new char[_fileSizeLimit];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var i = 0;Di2015NewLine            // split the stream into filesDi2015NewLine            using (var streamReader = new StreamReader(memoryStream))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int readLength;Di2015NewLine                while ((readLength = streamReader.Read(buffer, 0, _fileSizeLimit)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var filename Di2015NewLine                        = Path.ChangeExtension(filenameBase, Di2015NewLine                            string.Format(extensionFormat, i++));Di2015NewLine                    using (var fileStream = new StreamWriter(filename))Di2015NewLine                        fileStream.Write(buffer, 0, readLength);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the a file extension formatter based on the Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="fileLength">length of the file</param> Di2015NewLine    /// and the max file lengthDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private string GetExtensionFormat(long fileLength)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var numFiles = fileLength / _fileSizeLimit;Di2015NewLine        var extensionLength = Math.Ceiling(Math.Log10(numFiles));Di2015NewLine        var zeros = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        for (var j = 0; j < extensionLength; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            zeros += "0";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("xml.part{{0:{0}}}", zeros);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2308669Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable> Split(this  IEnumerable tokens, TokenType type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ArrayList currentT = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLine    foreach (object list in tokens)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Token token = list as Token;Di2015NewLine        if ((token != null) && token.TokenType == type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return currentT;Di2015NewLine            currentT.Clear();Di2015NewLine            //currentT = new ArrayList(); <-- Use this instead of 'currentT.Clear();' if you want the returned lists to be a different instanceDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if ((list is TokenType) && ((TokenType)list) == type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return currentT;Di2015NewLine            currentT.Clear();Di2015NewLine            //currentT = new ArrayList(); <-- Use this instead of 'currentT.Clear();' if you want the returned lists to be a different instanceDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            currentT.Add(list);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2308669Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable SplitInnerLoop(IEnumerator iter, TokenType type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Token token = iter.Current as Token;Di2015NewLine        if ((token != null) && token.TokenType == type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if ((iter.Current is TokenType) && ((TokenType)iter.Current) == type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return iter.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } while (iter.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable> Split(this  IEnumerable tokens, TokenType type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerator iter = tokens.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    while (iter.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return SplitInnerLoop(iter, type);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

       {Di2015NewLine                    string fileName = Path.GetFileName(url.AbsoluteUri);Di2015NewLine                    string extension = GetExtensionByMimeType(mimeType);Di2015NewLine                    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(fileName)Di2015NewLine                        || fileName.Length > 200)Di2015NewLine                        fileName = DateTime.Now.ToString("yyyyMMddHHmmss");Di2015NewLine                    if (!Path.GetExtension(fileName).Equals(extensionDi2015NewLine                        ,StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine                        fileName += extension;Di2015NewLine                    string tempFolder =            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new WebException("Requiested address is not available at the moment.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SendMessage(emailTo,url.AbsoluteUri,ex.Message,null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SendUrlToEmail(string urlDi2015NewLine        ,string emailToDi2015NewLine        ,string charset)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Encoding      msg.To = emailTo;Di2015NewLine            msg.Configuration.Fields[GmailMessage.SMTP_SERVER].Value = SmtpServer;Di2015NewLine            msg.Configuration.Fields[GmailMessage.SEND_USING].Value = 2;Di2015NewLine            msg.Configuration.Fields.Update();Di2015NewLine            msg.Send();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if 2315093Di2015UniqueSeparator[DllImport( "user32.dll" )]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern bool ShowWindowAsync( HandleRef hWnd, int nCmdShow );Di2015NewLinepublic const int SW_RESTORE = 9;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void SwitchToCurrent() {Di2015NewLine  IntPtr hWnd = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine  Process process = Process.GetCurrentProcess();Di2015NewLine  Process[] processes = Process.GetProcessesByName( process.ProcessName );Di2015NewLine  foreach ( Process _process in processes ) {Di2015NewLine    // Get the first instance that is not this instance, has theDi2015NewLine    // same process name and was started from the same file nameDi2015NewLine    // and location. 2315614Di2015UniqueSeparator// 0-based indexesDi2015NewLinestatic string RcToA1(int row, int col)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string toRet = "";Di2015NewLine    int mag = 0;Di2015NewLine    while(col >= Math.Pow(26, mag+1)){mag++;}Di2015NewLine    while (mag>0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        toRet += System.Convert.ToChar(64 + (byte)Math.Truncate((double)(col/(Math.Pow(26,mag)))));Di2015NewLine        col -= (int)Math.Truncate((double)Math.Pow(26, mag--));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    toRet += System.Convert.ToChar(65 + col);Di2015NewLine    return toRet + (row + 1).ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic Random rand = new Random(DateTime.Now.Millisecond);Di2015NewLinestatic string RandomExcelFormat()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch ((int)Math.Round(rand.NextDouble(),0))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case 0: return "0.00%";Di2015NewLine        default: return "0.00";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestruct ExcelFormatSpecifierDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object NumberFormat;Di2015NewLine    public string RangeAddress;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void DoWork()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<ExcelFormatSpecifier> NumberFormatList = new List<ExcelFormatSpecifier>(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    object[,] rangeData = new object[rows,cols];Di2015NewLine    for(int r = 0; r < rows; r++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for(int c = 0; c < cols; c++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            someVal = r + c;Di2015NewLine            rangeData[r,c] = someVal.ToString();Di2015NewLine            NumberFormatList.Add(new ExcelFormatSpecifierDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    NumberFormat = RandomExcelFormat(),Di2015NewLine                    RangeAddress = RcToA1(rowIndex, colIndex)Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    range.set_Value(MissingValue, rangeData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int max_format = 50;Di2015NewLine    foreach (string formatSpecifier in NumberFormatList.Select(p => p.NumberFormat).Distinct())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> addresses = NumberFormatList.Where(p => p.NumberFormat == formatSpecifier).Select(p => p.RangeAddress).ToList();Di2015NewLine        while (addresses.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string addressSpecifier = string.Join(",",     addresses.Take(max_format).ToArray());Di2015NewLine            range.get_Range(addressSpecifier, MissingValue).NumberFormat = formatSpecifier;Di2015NewLine            addresses = addresses.Skip(max_format).ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2315682Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Comparer : IComparer<string>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, int> _order;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Comparer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> list = new List<string>()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            "CS01",Di2015NewLine            "CS58",Di2015NewLine            "CS11"Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _order = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < list.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _order.Add(list[i], i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x.Length < 4 || y.Length < 4)Di2015NewLine            return x.CompareTo(y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string xPrefix = x.Substring(0, 4);Di2015NewLine        string yPrefix = y.Substring(0, 4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int xSequence;Di2015NewLine        int ySequence;Di2015NewLine        if (_order.TryGetValue(xPrefix, out xSequence)Di2015NewLine            && _order.TryGetValue(yPrefix, out ySequence))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return xSequence.CompareTo(ySequence);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return x.CompareTo(y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2316121Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text.pdf;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace PDFReaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Parses a PDF file and extracts the text from it.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class PDFParserDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// BT = Beginning of a text object operator Di2015NewLine        /// ET = End of a text object operatorDi2015NewLine        /// Td move to the start of next lineDi2015NewLine        ///  5 Ts = superscriptDi2015NewLine        /// -5 Ts = subscriptDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region FieldsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region _numberOfCharsToKeepDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The number of characters to keep, when extracting text.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static int _numberOfCharsToKeep = 15;Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region ExtractTextDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Extracts a text from a PDF file.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="inFileName">the full path to the pdf file.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="outFileName">the output file name.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>the extracted text</returns>Di2015NewLine        public bool ExtractText(string inFileName, string outFileName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StreamWriter outFile = null;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create a reader for the given PDF fileDi2015NewLine                PdfReader reader = new PdfReader(inFileName);Di2015NewLine                //outFile = File.CreateText(outFileName);Di2015NewLine                outFile = new StreamWriter(outFileName, false, System.Text.Encoding.UTF8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.Write("Processing: ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int totalLen = 68;Di2015NewLine                float charUnit = ((float)totalLen) / (float)reader.NumberOfPages;Di2015NewLine                int totalWritten = 0;Di2015NewLine                float curUnit = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int page = 1; page <= reader.NumberOfPages; page++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    outFile.Write(ExtractTextFromPDFBytes(reader.GetPageContent(page)) + " ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Write the progress.Di2015NewLine                    if (charUnit >= 1.0f)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < (int)charUnit; i++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Console.Write("#");Di2015NewLine                            totalWritten++;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        curUnit += charUnit;Di2015NewLine                        if (curUnit >= 1.0f)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            for (int i = 0; i < (int)curUnit; i++)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                Console.Write("#");Di2015NewLine                                totalWritten++;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            curUnit = 0;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (totalWritten < totalLen)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i < (totalLen - totalWritten); i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write("#");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (outFile != null) outFile.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region ExtractTextFromPDFBytesDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// This method processes an uncompressed Adobe (text) object Di2015NewLine        /// and extracts text.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="input">uncompressed</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public string ExtractTextFromPDFBytes(byte[] input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (input == null || input.Length == 0) return "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string resultString = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Flag showing if we are we currently inside a text objectDi2015NewLine                bool inTextObject = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Flag showing if the next character is literal Di2015NewLine                // e.g. '\\\\' to get a '\\' character or '\\(' to get '('Di2015NewLine                bool nextLiteral = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // () Bracket nesting level. Text appears inside ()Di2015NewLine                int bracketDepth = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Keep previous chars to get extract numbers etc.:Di2015NewLine                char[] previousCharacters = new char[_numberOfCharsToKeep];Di2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < _numberOfCharsToKeep; j++) previousCharacters[j] = ' ';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < input.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    char c = (char)input[i];Di2015NewLine                    if (input[i] == 213)Di2015NewLine                        c = "'".ToCharArray()[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (inTextObject)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Position the textDi2015NewLine                        if (bracketDepth == 0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (CheckToken(new string[] { "TD", "Td" }, previousCharacters))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                resultString += "\\n\\r";Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (CheckToken(new string[] { "'", "T*", "\\"" }, previousCharacters))Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    resultString += "\\n";Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                elseDi2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    if (CheckToken(new string[] { "Tj" }, previousCharacters))Di2015NewLine                                    {Di2015NewLine                                        resultString += " ";Di2015NewLine                                    }Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // End of a text object, also go to a new line.Di2015NewLine                        if (bracketDepth == 0 &&Di2015NewLine                            CheckToken(new string[] { "ET" }, previousCharacters))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            inTextObject = false;Di2015NewLine                            resultString += " ";Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // Start outputting textDi2015NewLine                            if ((c == '(') && (bracketDepth == 0) && (!nextLiteral))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                bracketDepth = 1;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                // Stop outputting textDi2015NewLine                                if ((c == ')') && (bracketDepth == 1) && (!nextLiteral))Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    bracketDepth = 0;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                elseDi2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    // Just a normal text character:Di2015NewLine                                    if (bracketDepth == 1)Di2015NewLine                                    {Di2015NewLine                                        // Only print out next character no matter what. Di2015NewLine                                        // Do not interpret.Di2015NewLine                                        if (c == '\\\\' && !nextLiteral)Di2015NewLine                                        {Di2015NewLine                                            resultString += c.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                            nextLiteral = true;Di2015NewLine                                        }Di2015NewLine                                        elseDi2015NewLine                                        {Di2015NewLine                                            if (((c >= ' ') && (c <= '~')) ||Di2015NewLine                                                ((c >= 128) && (c < 255)))Di2015NewLine                                            {Di2015NewLine                                                resultString += c.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                            nextLiteral = false;Di2015NewLine                                        }Di2015NewLine                                    }Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Store the recent characters for Di2015NewLine                    // when we have to go back for a checkingDi2015NewLine                    for (int j = 0; j < _numberOfCharsToKeep - 1; j++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        previousCharacters[j] = previousCharacters[j + 1];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    previousCharacters[_numberOfCharsToKeep - 1] = c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Start of a text objectDi2015NewLine                    if (!inTextObject && CheckToken(new string[] { "BT" }, previousCharacters))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        inTextObject = true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return CleanupContent(resultString);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return "";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string CleanupContent(string text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] patterns = { @"\\\\\\(", @"\\\\\\)", @"\\\\226", @"\\\\222", @"\\\\223", @"\\\\224", @"\\\\340", @"\\\\342", @"\\\\344", @"\\\\300", @"\\\\302", @"\\\\304", @"\\\\351", @"\\\\350", @"\\\\352", @"\\\\353", @"\\\\311", @"\\\\310", @"\\\\312", @"\\\\313", @"\\\\362", @"\\\\364", @"\\\\366", @"\\\\322", @"\\\\324", @"\\\\326", @"\\\\354", @"\\\\356", @"\\\\357", @"\\\\314", @"\\\\316", @"\\\\317", @"\\\\347", @"\\\\307", @"\\\\371", @"\\\\373", @"\\\\374", @"\\\\331", @"\\\\333", @"\\\\334", @"\\\\256", @"\\\\231", @"\\\\253", @"\\\\273", @"\\\\251", @"\\\\221" };Di2015NewLine            string[] replace = { "(", ")", "-", "'", "\\"", "\\"", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "?", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "'" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < patterns.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string regExPattern = patterns[i];Di2015NewLine                Regex regex = new Regex(regExPattern, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine                text = regex.Replace(text, replace[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return text;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region CheckTokenDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Check if a certain 2 character token just came along (e.g. BT)Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="tokens">the searched token</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="recent">the recent character array</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        private bool CheckToken(string[] tokens, char[] recent)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (string token in tokens)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if ((recent[_numberOfCharsToKeep - 3] == token[0]) &&Di2015NewLine                        (recent[_numberOfCharsToKeep - 2] == token[1]) &&Di2015NewLine                        ((recent[_numberOfCharsToKeep - 1] == ' ') ||Di2015NewLine                        (recent[_numberOfCharsToKeep - 1] == 0x0d) ||Di2015NewLine                        (recent[_numberOfCharsToKeep - 1] == 0x0a)) &&Di2015NewLine                        ((recent[_numberOfCharsToKeep - 4] == ' ') ||Di2015NewLine                        (recent[_numberOfCharsToKeep - 4] == 0x0d) ||Di2015NewLine                        (recent[_numberOfCharsToKeep - 4] == 0x0a))Di2015NewLine                        )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine              return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2316440Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class DrawingUtilityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // linear equation solver utility for ai + bj = c and di + ej = fDi2015NewLine    static void solvexy(double a, double b, double c, double d, double e, double f, out double i, out double j)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        j = (c - a / d * f) / (b - a * e / d);Di2015NewLine        i = (c - (b * j)) / a;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // basis functionsDi2015NewLine    static double b0(double t) { return Math.Pow(1 - t, 3); }Di2015NewLine    static double b1(double t) { return t * (1 - t) * (1 - t) * 3; }Di2015NewLine    static double b2(double t) { return (1 - t) * t * t * 3; }Di2015NewLine    static double b3(double t) { return Math.Pow(t, 3); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void bez4pts1(double x0, double y0, double x4, double y4, double x5, double y5, double x3, double y3, out double x1, out double y1, out double x2, out double y2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // find chord lengthsDi2015NewLine        double c1 = Math.Sqrt((x4 - x0) * (x4 - x0) + (y4 - y0) * (y4 - y0));Di2015NewLine        double c2 = Math.Sqrt((x5 - x4) * (x5 - x4) + (y5 - y4) * (y5 - y4));Di2015NewLine        double c3 = Math.Sqrt((x3 - x5) * (x3 - x5) + (y3 - y5) * (y3 - y5));Di2015NewLine        // guess "best" tDi2015NewLine        double t1 = c1 / (c1 + c2 + c3);Di2015NewLine        double t2 = (c1 + c2) / (c1 + c2 + c3);Di2015NewLine        // transform x1 and x2Di2015NewLine        solvexy(b1(t1), b2(t1), x4 - (x0 * b0(t1)) - (x3 * b3(t1)), b1(t2), b2(t2), x5 - (x0 * b0(t2)) - (x3 * b3(t2)), out x1, out x2);Di2015NewLine        // transform y1 and y2Di2015NewLine        solvexy(b1(t1), b2(t1), y4 - (y0 * b0(t1)) - (y3 * b3(t1)), b1(t2), b2(t2), y5 - (y0 * b0(t2)) - (y3 * b3(t2)), out y1, out y2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static public PathFigure BezierFromIntersection(Point startPt, Point int1, Point int2, Point endPt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double x1, y1, x2, y2;Di2015NewLine        bez4pts1(startPt.X, startPt.Y, int1.X, int1.Y, int2.X, int2.Y, endPt.X, endPt.Y, out x1, out y1, out x2, out y2);Di2015NewLine        PathFigure p = new PathFigure { StartPoint = startPt };Di2015NewLine        p.Segments.Add(new BezierSegment { Point1 = new Point(x1, y1), Point2 = new Point(x2, y2), Point3 = endPt } );Di2015NewLine        return p;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2316440Di2015UniqueSeparatorDrawingUtility.BezierFromIntersection
2316440Di2015UniqueSeparatorPathFigure

2317459Di2015UniqueSeparator            0x0001  - Volume attribute (archive volume)Di2015NewLine            0x0002  - Archive comment presentDi2015NewLine                      RAR 3.x uses the separate comment blockDi2015NewLine                      and does not set this flag.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            0x0004  - Archive lock attributeDi2015NewLine            0x0008  - Solid attribute (solid archive)Di2015NewLine            0x0010  - New volume naming scheme (\\'volname.partN.rar\\')Di2015NewLine            0x0020  - Authenticity information presentDi2015NewLine                      RAR 3.x does not set this flag.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            0x0040  - Recovery record presentDi2015NewLine            0x0080  - Block headers are encryptedDi2015NewLine            0x0100  - First volume (set only by RAR 3.0 and later)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            other bits in HEAD_FLAGS are reserved forDi2015NewLine            internal useDi2015NewLine

2317459Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string LocateFirstVolume(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var isVolume = false;Di2015NewLine    var parts = 1u;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine x.Name.Equals("IsVolume") && x.Value.Equals(true));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        parts = (Di2015NewLine            from x in extractor.ArchivePropertiesDi2015NewLine            where StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rarFile = Di2015NewLine            Path.Combine(Di2015NewLine                Path.GetDirectoryName(filename),     }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2319283Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Point Zero;Di2015NewLine[SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Usage", "CA1806:DoNotIgnoreMethodResults")]Di2015NewLinevoid UpdateWindow() {Di2015NewLine    IntPtr screenDC = NativeMethods.GetDC(IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine    IntPtr imageDC = NativeMethods.CreateCompatibleDC(screenDC);Di2015NewLine    IntPtr gdiBitmap = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    IntPtr oldBitmap = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        gdiBitmap = image.GetHbitmap(Color.FromArgb(0));                //Get a GDI handle to the image.Di2015NewLine        oldBitmap = NativeMethods.SelectObject(imageDC, gdiBitmap);     //Select the image into the DC, and cache the old bitmap.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Size size = image.Size;                                         //Get the size and location of the form, as integers.Di2015NewLine        Point location = this.Location;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BlendFunction alphaInfo = new BlendFunction { SourceConstantAlpha = 255, AlphaFormat = 1 }; //This struct provides information about the opacity of the form.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        NativeMethods.UpdateLayeredWindow(Handle, screenDC, ref location, ref size, imageDC, ref Zero, 0, ref alphaInfo, UlwType.Alpha);Di2015NewLine    } finally {Di2015NewLine        NativeMethods.ReleaseDC(IntPtr.Zero, screenDC);                 //Release the Screen's DC.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (gdiBitmap != IntPtr.Zero) {                                 //If we got a GDI bitmap,Di2015NewLine            NativeMethods.SelectObject(imageDC, oldBitmap);             //Select the old bitmap into the DCDi2015NewLine            NativeMethods.DeleteObject(gdiBitmap);                      //Delete the GDI bitmap,Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        NativeMethods.DeleteDC(imageDC);                                //And delete the DC.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Invalidate();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2320124Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Image RezizeImage(Image img, int maxWidth, int maxHeight)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(img.Height < maxHeight && img.Width < maxWidth) return img;Di2015NewLine    using (img)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Double xRatio = (double)img.Width / maxWidth;Di2015NewLine        Double yRatio = (double)img.Height / maxHeight;Di2015NewLine        Double ratio = Math.Max(xRatio, yRatio);Di2015NewLine        int nnx = (int)Math.Floor(img.Width / ratio);Di2015NewLine        int nny = (int)Math.Floor(img.Height / ratio);Di2015NewLine        Bitmap cpy = new Bitmap(nnx, nny, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine        using (Graphics gr = Graphics.FromImage(cpy))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            gr.Clear(Color.Transparent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // This is said to give best quality when resizing imagesDi2015NewLine            gr.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            gr.DrawImage(img,Di2015NewLine                new Rectangle(0, 0, nnx, nny),Di2015NewLine                new Rectangle(0, 0, img.Width, img.Height),Di2015NewLine                GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return cpy;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate MemoryStream BytearrayToStream(byte[] arr)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return new MemoryStream(arr, 0, arr.Length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void HandleImageUpload(byte[] binaryImage)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Image img = RezizeImage(Image.FromStream(BytearrayToStream(binaryImage)), 103, 32);Di2015NewLine    img.Save("IMAGELOCATION.png", System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Gif);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2320213Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ItemDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name;Di2015NewLine    public Item Parent;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<Item> Collection = new List<Item>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var DataSource = data.InnerText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StreamReader Reader = new StreamReader(MapPath("_test2.txt"));Di2015NewLine    int LastLevel = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (Reader.EndOfStream == false) {Di2015NewLine        var line = Reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        var Level = line.Where((System.Object c) => c == "-").Count;Di2015NewLine        Item LastItem = default(Item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Collection.Count != 0) {Di2015NewLine            LastItem = Collection.Last();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Level == 0) {Di2015NewLine            Collection.Add(new Item { Name = line });Di2015NewLine            LastLevel = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (Level - LastLevel == 1) {Di2015NewLine            Collection.Add(new Item { Name = line, Parent = LastItem });Di2015NewLine            LastLevel += 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (Level == LastLevel) {Di2015NewLine            Collection.Add(new Item { Name = line, Parent = LastItem.Parent });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (Level < LastLevel) {Di2015NewLine            var LevelDiff = LastLevel - Level;Di2015NewLine            Item Parent = LastItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i <= LevelDiff; i++) {Di2015NewLine                Parent = Parent.Parent;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            LastLevel = Level;Di2015NewLine            Collection.Add(new Item { Name = line, Parent = Parent });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Reader.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2321370Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class DrawingUtilityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void bez3pts1(double x0, double y0, double x3, double y3, double x2, double y2, out double x1, out double y1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // find chord lengthsDi2015NewLine        double c1 = Math.Sqrt((x3 - x0) * (x3 - x0) + (y3 - y0) * (y3 - y0));Di2015NewLine        double c2 = Math.Sqrt((x3 - x2) * (x3 - x2) + (y3 - y2) * (y3 - y2));Di2015NewLine        // guess "best" tDi2015NewLine        double t = c1 / (c1 + c2);Di2015NewLine        // quadratic Bezier is B(t) = (1-t)^2*P0 + 2*t*(1-t)*P1 + t^2*P2Di2015NewLine        // solving gives P1 = [B(t) - (1-t)^2*P0 - t^2*P2] / [2*t*(1-t)] where P3 is B(t)Di2015NewLine        x1 = (x3 - (1 - t) * (1 - t) * x0 - t * t * x2) / (2 * t * (1 - t));Di2015NewLine        y1 = (y3 - (1 - t) * (1 - t) * y0 - t * t * y2) / (2 * t * (1 - t));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // pass in a PathFigure and it will append a QuadraticBezierSegment connecting the previous point to int1 and endPtDi2015NewLine    static public void QuadraticBezierFromIntersection(PathFigure path, Point startPt, Point int1, Point endPt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double x1, y1;Di2015NewLine        bez3pts1(startPt.X, startPt.Y, int1.X, int1.Y, endPt.X, endPt.Y, out x1, out y1);Di2015NewLine        path.Segments.Add(new QuadraticBezierSegment { Point1 = new Point(x1, y1), Point2 = endPt } );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2323309Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class SettingsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string _filename;Di2015NewLine    private readonly XmlDocument _doc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const string emptyFile =Di2015NewLine        @"<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" ?>Di2015NewLine          <configuration>Di2015NewLine              <appSettings>Di2015NewLine                  <add key=""defaultkey"" value=""123"" />Di2015NewLine                  <add key=""anotherkey"" value=""abc"" />Di2015NewLine              </appSettings>Di2015NewLine          </configuration>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Settings(string path, string filename)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // strip any trailing backslashes...Di2015NewLine        while (path.Length > 0 && path.EndsWith("\\\\"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            path = path.Remove(path.Length - 1, 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _filename = Path.Combine(path, filename);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!Directory.Exists(path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Directory.CreateDirectory(path);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!File.Exists(_filename))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Create it...Di2015NewLine            _doc.LoadXml(emptyFile);Di2015NewLine            _doc.Save(_filename);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _doc.Load(_filename);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Retrieve a value by name.Di2015NewLine    /// Returns the supplied DefaultValue if not found.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public string Get(string key, string defaultValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlNode node = _doc.SelectSingleNode("configuration/appSettings/add[@key='" + key + "']");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (node == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return defaultValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return node.Attributes["value"].Value ?? defaultValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Write a config value by keyDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void Set(string key, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlNode node = _doc.SelectSingleNode("configuration/appSettings/add[@key='" + key + "']");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (node != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            node.Attributes["value"].Value = value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _doc.Save(_filename);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2324328Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool Equals(ImmutableBitArray other)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (this.length != other.length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int finalIndex = this.Array.Length - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < finalIndex; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.Array[i] != other.Array[i])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // check the last array element, making sure to ignore padding bitsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int shift = 32 - (this.length % 32);Di2015NewLine    if (shift == 32) {Di2015NewLine        // the last array element has no padding bits - don't shiftDi2015NewLine        shift = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (this.Array[finalIndex] << shift != other.Array[finalIndex] << shift)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2333242Di2015UniqueSeparator private void Process()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (client.Connected == true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine                        // bytes contains received data in byte[].Di2015NewLine                        // Translate data bytes to a UTF-8 string.Di2015NewLine data sent by the client.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        byte[] msg = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Send back a response.Di2015NewLine                        stream.Write(msg, 0, msg.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        CommEventArgs comEventArg = new CommEventArgs();Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Exception : " + ex.Message);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    client.Close();Di2015NewLine                }                  Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

2334002Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void emas(string text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const string MatchEmailPattern =Di2015NewLine           @"(([\\w-]+\\.)+[\\w-]+|([a-zA-Z]{1}|[\\w-]{2,}))@"Di2015NewLine           + @"((([0-1]?[0-9]{1,2}|25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9])\\.([0-1]?[0-9]{1,2}|25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9])\\."Di2015NewLine             + @"([0-1]?[0-9]{1,2}|25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9])\\.([0-1]?[0-9]{1,2}|25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9])){1}|"Di2015NewLine           + @"([a-zA-Z]+[\\w-]+\\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,4})";Di2015NewLine            Regex rx = new Regex(MatchEmailPattern,  RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine            // Find matches.Di2015NewLine            MatchCollection matches = rx.Matches(text);Di2015NewLine            // Report the number of matches found.Di2015NewLine            int noOfMatches = matches.Count;Di2015NewLine            // Report on each match.Di2015NewLine            foreach (Match match in matches)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(match.Value.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

2338932Di2015UniqueSeparator[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void Can_add_from_multiple_threads()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int MaxWorkers = 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var list = new ThreadSafeList<int>(MaxWorkers);Di2015NewLine    int remainingWorkers = MaxWorkers;Di2015NewLine    var workCompletedEvent = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < MaxWorkers; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int workerNum = i;  // Make a copy of local variable for next threadDi2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(s =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Add(workerNum);Di2015NewLine            if (Interlocked.Decrement(ref remainingWorkers) == 0)Di2015NewLine                workCompletedEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    workCompletedEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    workCompletedEvent.Close();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < MaxWorkers; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Assert.IsTrue(list.Contains(i), "Element was not added");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual(MaxWorkers, list.Count,Di2015NewLine        "List count does not match worker count.");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2338985Di2015UniqueSeparatorint equi ( int[] A ) {Di2015NewLine    int equi = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    long lower = 0;Di2015NewLine    long upper = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (int i in A)Di2015NewLine        upper += i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < A.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        upper -= A[i];Di2015NewLine        if (upper == lower)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            equi = i;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            lower += A[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return equi;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2343949Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst double CollisionBudget = 0.005;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCollision[] _allPossibleCollisions;Di2015NewLineint _lastCheckedCollision;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid HandleCollisions() {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var startTime = HighPerformanceCounter.Now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (_allPossibleCollisions == null || Di2015NewLine        _lastCheckedCollision >= _allPossibleCollisions.Length) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Start a new seriesDi2015NewLine        _allPossibleCollisions = GenerateAllPossibleCollisions();Di2015NewLine        _lastCheckedCollision = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i=_lastCheckedCollision; i<_allPossibleCollisions.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        // Don't go over the budgetDi2015NewLine        if (HighPerformanceCount.Now - startTime > CollisionBudget) {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _lastCheckedCollision = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (CheckCollision(_allPossibleCollisions[i])) {Di2015NewLine            HandleCollision(_allPossibleCollisions[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2344347Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Contains approximate string matchingDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinestatic class LevenshteinDistanceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Compute the distance between two strings.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static int Compute(string s, string t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int n = s.Length;Di2015NewLine        int m = t.Length;Di2015NewLine        int[,] d = new int[n + 1, m + 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Step 1Di2015NewLine        if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return m;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (m == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return n;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Step 2Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i <= n; d[i, 0] = i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j <= m; d[0, j] = j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Step 3Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Step 4Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Step 5Di2015NewLine                int cost = (t[j - 1] == s[i - 1]) ? 0 : 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Step 6Di2015NewLine                d[i, j] = Math.Min(Di2015NewLine                    Math.Min(d[i - 1, j] + 1, d[i, j - 1] + 1),Di2015NewLine                    d[i - 1, j - 1] + cost);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Step 7Di2015NewLine        return d[n, m];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(LevenshteinDistance.Compute("aunt", "ant"));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(LevenshteinDistance.Compute("Sam", "Samantha"));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(LevenshteinDistance.Compute("flomax", "volmax"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2350800Di2015UniqueSeparator    public double Area(List<Point3D> PtList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int nPts = PtList.Count;Di2015NewLine        Point3D a;Di2015NewLine        int j = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < nPts; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            j = (i + 1) % nPts;Di2015NewLine            a += Point3D.Cross(PtList[i], PtList[j]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        a /= 2;Di2015NewLine        return Point3D.Distance(a,default(Point3D));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Point3D Cross(Point3D v0, Point3D v1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Point3D(v0.Y * v1.Z - v0.Z * v1.Y,Di2015NewLine            v0.Z * v1.X - v0.X * v1.Z,Di2015NewLine            v0.X * v1.Y - v0.Y * v1.X);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2353186Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection.Emit;Di2015NewLinepublic delegate object ParamsConstructorDelegate(params object[] parameters);Di2015NewLinepublic class FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string s;Di2015NewLine    int i;Di2015NewLine    float? f;Di2015NewLine    public Foo(string s, int i, float? f)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.s = s;Di2015NewLine        this.i = i;Di2015NewLine        this.f = f;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ctor = Build(typeof(Foo));Di2015NewLine        Foo foo1 = (Foo)ctor("abc", 123, null);Di2015NewLine        Foo foo2 = (Foo)ctor(null, 123, 123.45F);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static ParamsConstructorDelegate Build(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var mthd = new DynamicMethod(".ctor", type,Di2015NewLine            new Type[] { typeof(object[]) });Di2015NewLine        var il = mthd.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine        var ctor = type.GetConstructors()[0]; // not very robust, but meh...Di2015NewLine        var ctorParams = ctor.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < ctorParams.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine            switch (i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case 0: il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_0); break;Di2015NewLine                case 1: il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_1); break;Di2015NewLine                case 2: il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_2); break;Di2015NewLine                case 3: il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_3); break;Di2015NewLine                case 4: il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_4); break;Di2015NewLine                case 5: il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_5); break;Di2015NewLine                case 6: il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_6); break;Di2015NewLine                case 7: il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_7); break;Di2015NewLine                case 8: il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_8); break;Di2015NewLine                default: il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4, i); break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldelem_Ref);Di2015NewLine            Type paramType = ctorParams[i].ParameterType;Di2015NewLine            il.Emit(paramType.IsValueType ? OpCodes.Unbox_AnyDi2015NewLine                : OpCodes.Castclass, paramType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Newobj, ctor);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLine        return (ParamsConstructorDelegate)Di2015NewLine            mthd.CreateDelegate(typeof(ParamsConstructorDelegate));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

System.Drawing.Point(0, 0), MatrixOrder.Append);Di2015NewLine        using (GraphicsPath gp = new GraphicsPath())Di2015NewLine        {  // transform image points by rotation matrixDi2015NewLine            gp.AddPolygon(new System.Drawing.Point[] { new System.Drawing.Point(0, 0), new System.Drawing.Point(bmpSrc.Width, 0), new System.Drawing.Point(0, bmpSrc.Height) });Di2015NewLine imageDi2015NewLine            Rectangle bbox = boundingBox(bmpSrc, mRotate);Di2015NewLine            Bitmap bmpDest = new Bitmap(bbox.Width, bbox.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (Graphics gDest = Graphics.FromImage(bmpDest))Di2015NewLine            {  // draw source into destDi2015NewLine                Matrix mDest = new Matrix();Di2015NewLine               return bmpDest;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Rectangle boundingBox(Image img, Matrix matrix)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        GraphicsUnit gu = new GraphicsUnit();Di2015NewLine        Rectangle rImg = Rectangle.Round(img.GetBounds(ref gu));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Transform the four points of the image, to get the resized bounding box.Di2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Point topLeft = new System.Drawing.Point(rImg.Left, rImg.Top);Di2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Point topRight = new System.Drawing.Point(rImg.Right, rImg.Top);Di2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Point bottomRight = new System.Drawing.Point(rImg.Right, rImg.Bottom);Di2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Point bottomLeft = new System.Drawing.Point(rImg.Left, rImg.Bottom);Di2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Point[] points = new System.Drawing.Point[] { topLeft, topRight, bottomRight, bottomLeft };Di2015NewLine        GraphicsPath gp = new GraphicsPath(points,Di2015NewLine                                                            new byte[] { (byte)PathPointType.Start, (byte)PathPointType.Line, (byte)PathPointType.Line, (byte)PathPointType.Line });Di2015NewLine        gp.Transform(matrix);Di2015NewLine        return Rectangle.Round(gp.GetBounds());Di2015NewLine 2357839Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct Distance : IEquatable<Distance>, IComparable<Distance>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly double MetersPerKilometer = 1000.0;Di2015NewLine    private static readonly double CentimetersPerMeter = 100.0;Di2015NewLine    private static readonly double CentimetersPerInch = 2.54;Di2015NewLine    private static readonly double InchesPerFoot = 12.0;Di2015NewLine    private static readonly double FeetPerYard = 3.0;Di2015NewLine    private static readonly double FeetPerMeter = CentimetersPerMeter / (CentimetersPerInch * InchesPerFoot);Di2015NewLine    private static readonly double InchesPerMeter = CentimetersPerMeter / CentimetersPerInch;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly double _meters;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Distance(double meters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this._meters = meters;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double TotalMetersDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _meters;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double TotalCentimetersDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _meters * CentimetersPerMeter;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double TotalYardsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _meters * FeetPerMeter / _meters * FeetPerMeter;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double TotalInchesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _meters * InchesPerMeter;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Distance FromKilometers(double value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine CentimetersPerMeter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Distance FromYards(double value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Distance(value * FeetPerYard / FeetPerMeter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Distance FromFeet(double value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Distance(value / InchesPerMeter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Distance operator +(Distance a, Distance b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Distance(a._meters + b._meters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Distance operator -(Distance a, Distance b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Distance(a._meters - 2364041Di2015UniqueSeparator    private string SendData(string method, string directory, string data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string page = string.Format("http://{0}/{1}", DeviceAddress, directory);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(page);Di2015NewLine        request.KeepAlive = false;Di2015NewLine        request.ProtocolVersion = HttpVersion.Version10;Di2015NewLine        request.Method = method;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // turn our request string into a byte streamDi2015NewLine        byte[] postBytes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(data != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            postBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(data);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            postBytes = new byte[0];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine        request.ContentLength = postBytes.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stream requestStream = request.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // now send itDi2015NewLine        requestStream.Write(postBytes, 0, postBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        requestStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse response;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return GetResponseData(response);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2364104Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static List<List<int>> splitBySeq(List<int> someList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Stores the resultDi2015NewLine        List<List<int>> result = new List<List<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Stores the current sequenceDi2015NewLine        List<int> currentLst = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        int? lastNumber = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Iterate the itemsDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < someList.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //If the have a "break" in the sequence and this isnt the first itemDi2015NewLine            if (lastNumber != null && someList[i] != lastNumber + 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.Add(currentLst);Di2015NewLine                currentLst = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            currentLst.Add(someList[i]);Di2015NewLine            lastNumber = someList[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (currentLst.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine            result.Add(currentLst);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2364597Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static FeedCheck{Di2015NewLine  int _count = 0;Di2015NewLine  static object _consumingSync = new object();Di2015NewLine  static Threading.Timer _produceTimer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static void Consume() {Di2015NewLine    if (Monitor.TryEnter(_consumingSync)) {Di2015NewLine       while(_count > 0) {Di2015NewLine         // check feedDi2015NewLine         Interlocked.Decrement(ref _count);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static void Produce() {Di2015NewLine    Interlocked.Increment(ref _count);Di2015NewLine    Consume();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static void Start() {Di2015NewLine    // small risk of race condition here, but not necessarilyDi2015NewLine    // be bad if multiple Timers existed for a moment, since onlyDi2015NewLine    // the last one will survive.Di2015NewLine    if (_produceTimer == null) {Di2015NewLine      _produceTimer = new Threading.Timer(Di2015NewLine        _ => FeedCheck.Produce(), null, 0, 1000Di2015NewLine      );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
