2367409Di2015UniqueSeparator// A simple thread pool implementation that provides STA threads instead of the MTA threads provided by the built-in thread poolDi2015NewLinepublic class STAThreadPoolDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int _maxThreads;Di2015NewLine  int _startedThreads;Di2015NewLine  int _idleThreads;Di2015NewLine  Queue<Action> _workQueue = new Queue<Action>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public STAThreadPool(int maxThreads)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    _maxThreads = maxThreads;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  void Run()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    while(true)Di2015NewLine      tryDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        Action action;Di2015NewLine        lock(_workQueue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          _idleThreads++;Di2015NewLine          while(_workQueue.Count==0)Di2015NewLine            Monitor.Wait(_workQueue);Di2015NewLine          action = _workQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine          _idleThreads++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        action();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.Trace.Write("STAThreadPool thread threw exception " + ex);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void QueueWork(Action action)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    lock(_workQueue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if(_startedThreads < _maxThreads && _idleThreads <= _workQueue.Count)Di2015NewLine        new Thread(Run) { ApartmentState = ApartmentState.STA, IsBackground = true, Name = "STAThreadPool#" + ++_startedThreads }.Start();Di2015NewLine      _workQueue.Enqueue(action);Di2015NewLine      Monitor.PulseAll(_workQueue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void InvokeOnPoolThread(Action action)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Exception exception = null;Di2015NewLine    using(ManualResetEvent doneEvent = new ManualResetEvent(false))  // someday:  Recycle these eventsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      QueueWork(delegateDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        try { action(); } catch(Exception ex) { exception = ex; }Di2015NewLine        doneEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine      });Di2015NewLine      doneEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if(exception!=null)Di2015NewLine      throw exception;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public T InvokeOnPoolThread<T>(Func<T> func)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    T result = default(T);Di2015NewLine    InvokeOnPoolThread(delegateDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      result = func();Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2368270Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void RedBlueShift(Bitmap bmp, double factor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte R = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte G = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte B = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte Rmax = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte Gmax = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte Bmax = 0;Di2015NewLine    double avg = 0;Di2015NewLine    double normal = 0;Di2015NewLine    if (factor > 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        factor = 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (factor < -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        factor = -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    for (int x = 0; x < bmp.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < bmp.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Color color = bmp.GetPixel(x, y);Di2015NewLine            R = color.R;Di2015NewLine            G = color.G;Di2015NewLine            B = color.B;Di2015NewLine            avg = (double)(R + G + B) / 3;Di2015NewLine            normal = avg / 255.0; // to preserve overall intensityDi2015NewLine            if (factor < 0) // red-tinted:Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (normal < .5)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Rmax = (byte)((normal / .5) * 255);Di2015NewLine                    Gmax = 0;Di2015NewLine                    Bmax = 0;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Rmax = 255;Di2015NewLine                    Gmax = (byte)(((normal - .5) * 2) * 255);Di2015NewLine                    Bmax = Gmax;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                R = (byte)((double)R - ((double)(R - Rmax) * -factor));Di2015NewLine                G = (byte)((double)G - ((double)(G - Gmax) * -factor));Di2015NewLine                B = (byte)((double)B - ((double)(B - Bmax) * -factor));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (factor > 0) // blue-tinted:Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (normal < .5)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Rmax = 0;Di2015NewLine                    Gmax = 0;Di2015NewLine                    Bmax = (byte)((normal / .5) * 255);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Rmax = (byte)(((normal - .5) * 2) * 255);Di2015NewLine                    Gmax = Rmax;Di2015NewLine                    Bmax = 255;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                R = (byte)((double)R - ((double)(R - Rmax) * factor));Di2015NewLine                G = (byte)((double)G - ((double)(G - Gmax) * factor));Di2015NewLine                B = (byte)((double)B - ((double)(B - Bmax) * factor));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            color = Color.FromArgb(R, G, B);Di2015NewLine            bmp.SetPixel(x, y, color);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2368290Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : Form {Di2015NewLine    public class Foo : List<Bar> {Di2015NewLine        public string FooName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public Foo(string name) { this.FooName = name; 2384533Di2015UniqueSeparatorDi2015NewLinepublic void ReadFile(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (FileStream fs = File.OpenRead(filename))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fs.Seek(128, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine        if (!(fs.ReadByte() != (byte)'D' ||Di2015NewLine              fs.ReadByte() != (byte)'I' ||Di2015NewLine              fs.ReadByte() != (byte)'C' ||Di2015NewLine              fs.ReadByte() != (byte)'M'))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Not a DCM");Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        BinaryReader reader = new BinaryReader(fs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ushort g;Di2015NewLine        ushort e;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            g = reader.ReadUInt16();Di2015NewLine            e = reader.ReadUInt16();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string vr = new string(reader.ReadChars(2));Di2015NewLine            long length;Di2015NewLine            if (vr.Equals("AE") || vr.Equals("AS") || vr.Equals("AT")Di2015NewLine                || vr.Equals("CS") || vr.Equals("DA") || vr.Equals("DS")Di2015NewLine                || vr.Equals("DT") || vr.Equals("FL") || vr.Equals("FD")Di2015NewLine                || vr.Equals("IS") || vr.Equals("LO") || vr.Equals("PN")Di2015NewLine                || vr.Equals("SH") || vr.Equals("SL") || vr.Equals("SS")Di2015NewLine                || vr.Equals("ST") || vr.Equals("TM") || vr.Equals("UI")Di2015NewLine                || vr.Equals("UL") || vr.Equals("US"))Di2015NewLine               length = reader.ReadUInt16();Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Read the reserved byteDi2015NewLine                reader.ReadUInt16();Di2015NewLine                length = reader.ReadUInt32();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] val = reader.ReadBytes((int) length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        } while (g == 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        fs.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2384587Di2015UniqueSeparator  public static class Sines {Di2015NewLine    private static double[] lut;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Sines() {Di2015NewLine      lut = new double[2048];Di2015NewLine      for (int ix = 0; ix < lut.Length; ++ix)Di2015NewLine        lut[ix] = Math.Sin(Math.PI * 2 * ix / lut.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double Lookup(int index) {Di2015NewLine      return lut[index];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

2387394Di2015UniqueSeparator    public List<T> ReturnList<T>() where T : new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<T> fdList = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine            myCommand.CommandText = QueryString;Di2015NewLine            SqlDataReader nwReader = myCommand.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLine            Type objectType = typeof (T);Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo[] typeFields = objectType.GetProperties();Di2015NewLine            if (nwReader != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (nwReader.Read())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    T obj = new T();Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i < nwReader.FieldCount; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        foreach (PropertyInfo info in typeFields)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // Because the class may have fields that are *not* being filled, I don't use nwReader[info.Name] in this function.Di2015NewLine                            if (info.Name == nwReader.GetName(i))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (!nwReader[i].Equals(DBNull.Value)) Di2015NewLine                                    info.SetValue(obj, nwReader[i], null);Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    fdList.Add(obj);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                nwReader.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return fdList;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            conn.Close();Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2388011Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<int> Bucketize(this IEnumerable<decimal> source, int totalBuckets)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var min = source.Min();Di2015NewLine    var max = source.Max();Di2015NewLine    var buckets = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var bucketSize = (max - min) / totalBuckets;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var value in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int bucketIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine        if (bucketSize > 0.0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bucketIndex = (int)((value - min) / bucketSize);Di2015NewLine            if (bucketIndex == totalBuckets)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bucketIndex--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        buckets[bucketIndex]++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return buckets;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2388592Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// This method returns a fully qualified absolute server Url which includesDi2015NewLine/// the protocol, server, port in addition to the server relative Url.Di2015NewLine/// Di2015NewLine/// Works like Control.ResolveUrl including support for ~ syntaxDi2015NewLine/// but returns an absolute URL.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="ServerUrl">Any Url, either App relative or fully qualified</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="forceHttps">if true forces the url to use https</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string ResolveServerUrl(string serverUrl, bool forceHttps)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // *** Is it already an absolute Url?Di2015NewLine    if (serverUrl.IndexOf("://") > -1)Di2015NewLine        return serverUrl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // *** Start by fixing up the Url an Application relative UrlDi2015NewLine    string newUrl = ResolveUrl(serverUrl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Uri originalUri = HttpContext.Current.Request.Url;Di2015NewLine    newUrl = (forceHttps ? "https" : originalUri.Scheme) + Di2015NewLine             "://" + originalUri.Authority + newUrl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return newUrl;Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// This method returns a fully qualified absolute server Url which includesDi2015NewLine/// the protocol, server, port in addition to the server relative Url.Di2015NewLine/// Di2015NewLine/// It work like Page.ResolveUrl, but adds these to the beginning.Di2015NewLine/// This method is useful for generating Urls for AJAX methodsDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="ServerUrl">Any Url, either App relative or fully qualified</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string ResolveServerUrl(string serverUrl)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return ResolveServerUrl(serverUrl, false);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2389701Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Function FromBCD(ByVal BCD As String, ByVal intsz As Integer, ByVal decsz As Integer) As DecimalDi2015NewLine    Dim PicLen As Integer = intsz + decszDi2015NewLine    Dim result As Decimal = 0Di2015NewLine    Dim val As Integer = Asc(Mid(BCD, 1, 1))Di2015NewLine    Do While PicLen > 0Di2015NewLine        result *= 10DDi2015NewLine        result += val \\ 16Di2015NewLine        PicLen -= 1Di2015NewLine        If PicLen > 0 ThenDi2015NewLine            result *= 10DDi2015NewLine            result += val Mod 16Di2015NewLine            PicLen -= 1Di2015NewLine            BCD = Mid(BCD, 2)Di2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine        val = Asc(Mid(BCD, 1, 1))Di2015NewLine    LoopDi2015NewLine    If val Mod 16 = &HD& ThenDi2015NewLine        result = -resultDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLine    Return result / CDec(10 ^ decsz)Di2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

2393788Di2015UniqueSeparator            byte[] byteArray = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes (postData);Di2015NewLine            // Set the ContentType property of the WebRequest.Di2015NewLine            request.ContentType = "application/json";Di2015NewLine            // Set the ContentLength property of the WebRequest.Di2015NewLine            request.ContentLength = byteArray.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Do a http basic authentication somehowDi2015NewLine            string username = "<application key from urban airship>";Di2015NewLine            string password = "<master secret from urban airship>"; Because we are going to use the currentDi2015NewLine        // working directory as the physical backing directory forDi2015NewLine        // the ASPNET host, we need to ensure there's a binDi2015NewLine        // subdirectory present.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool cleanBin = false;Di2015NewLine        if (!Directory.Exists("bin"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cleanBin = true;Di2015NewLine            Directory.CreateDirectory("bin");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Now, ensure that the assembly containing the custom host isDi2015NewLine        // present in that bin directory.  The assembly containing theDi2015NewLine        // custom host is actually *this* assembly.  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var a = System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly();Di2015NewLine        string destfile= Path.Combine("bin", Path.GetFileName(a.Location));Di2015NewLine        File.Copy(a.Location, destfile, true); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        host =Di2015NewLine            (MyAspNetHost) System.Web.Hosting.ApplicationHost.CreateApplicationHostDi2015NewLine            ( typeof(MyAspNetHost),Di2015NewLine              "/foo",   // virtual dir - can be anythingDi2015NewLine              System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory() // physical dirDi2015NewLine              );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // process each pageDi2015NewLine        foreach (string page in pages)Di2015NewLine            host.ProcessRequest(page);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

           Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<object> GetChangedEntities()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ChangeSet changes = this.GetChangeSet();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return changes.Inserts.Concat(changes.Updates);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic class ValidationException : ExceptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ValidationException(IEnumerable<ValidationResult> results)Di2015NewLine        : base("There are validation errors.")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Results = new ReadOnlyCollection<ValidationResult>(Di2015NewLine            results.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ReadOnlyCollection<ValidationResult> ResultsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get; 2396483Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void MergeWith<T>(this T primary, T secondary) {Di2015NewLine    foreach (var pi in typeof(T).GetProperties()) {Di2015NewLine       var priValue = pi.GetGetMethod().Invoke(primary, null);Di2015NewLine       var secValue = pi.GetGetMethod().Invoke(secondary, null);Di2015NewLine       if (priValue == null || (pi.PropertyType.IsValueType && priValue.Equals(Activator.CreateInstance(pi.PropertyType)))) {Di2015NewLine          pi.GetSetMethod().Invoke(primary, new object[]{secValue});Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2396504Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void BuildDefaultSQLInsert()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // get instance to the object ONCE up frontDi2015NewLine   // This is a private property on the data manager class of IDbCommand typeDi2015NewLine   oSQLInsert = GetSQLCommand("");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // pre-build respective insert statement and parameters ONCE. Di2015NewLine   // This way, when actually called, the object and their expectedDi2015NewLine   // parameter objects already in place.  We just need to updateDi2015NewLine   // the "Value" inside the parameterDi2015NewLine   String SQLCommand = "INSERT INTO MySQLTable ( ";Di2015NewLine   String InsertValues = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Now, build a string of the "insert" values to be paired, soDi2015NewLine   // add appropriate columns to the string, and IMMEDIATELY add theirDi2015NewLine   // respective "Value" as a parameterDi2015NewLine   DataTable MyTable = GetFromSQL( "Select * from MySQLTable where MyIDColumn = -1" );Di2015NewLine   foreach (DataColumn oCol in MyTable.Columns)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      // only add columns that ARE NOT The primary ID columnDi2015NewLine      if (!(oCol.ColumnName.ToUpper() == "MYIDCOLUMN" ))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         // add all other columns comma seperated...Di2015NewLine         SQLCommand += oCol.ColumnName + ",";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         InsertValues += "?,";Di2015NewLine         // Ensure a place-holder for the parameters so they stay in synch Di2015NewLine         // with the string.  My AddDbParm() function would create the DbParameterDi2015NewLine         // by the given column name and default value as previously detectedDi2015NewLine         // based on String, Int, DateTime, etc...Di2015NewLine         oSQLInsert.Parameters.Add(AddDbParm(oCol.ColumnName, oCol.DefaultValue));Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Strip the trailing comma from each element... command text, and its insert valuesDi2015NewLine   SQLCommand = SQLCommand.Substring(0, SQLCommand.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine   InsertValues = InsertValues.Substring(0, InsertValues.Length - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Now, close the command text with ") VALUES ( " Di2015NewLine   // and add  the INSERT VALUES element parmsDi2015NewLine   SQLCommand += " ) values ( " + InsertValues + " )";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Update the final command text to the SQLInsert object Di2015NewLine   // and we're done with the prep ONCEDi2015NewLine   oSQLInsert.CommandText = SQLCommand;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2396504Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Boolean AddMyRecord(DataRow oDR)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // the parameter name was set based on the name of the column, Di2015NewLine   // so I KNOW there will be a match, and same data typeDi2015NewLine   foreach (IDbDataParameter oDBP in oSQLInsert.Parameters)Di2015NewLine      oDBP.Value = oDR[oDBP.ParameterName];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   ExecuteMySQLCommand( oSQLInsert );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2398739Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static PropertyInfo GetPropertyByPath( object obj, string propertyPath )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ParameterValidation.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace( propertyPath, "propertyPath" );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ( obj == null ) {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }   // ifDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Type type = obj.GetType( );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PropertyInfo propertyInfo = null;Di2015NewLine    foreach ( var part in propertyPath.Split( new char[] { '.' } ) ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // On subsequent iterations use the type of the propertyDi2015NewLine        if ( propertyInfo != null ) {Di2015NewLine            type = propertyInfo.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine        }   // ifDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the property at this partDi2015NewLine        propertyInfo = type.GetProperty( part );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Not foundDi2015NewLine        if ( propertyInfo == null ) {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }   // ifDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Can't navigate into indexerDi2015NewLine        if ( propertyInfo.GetIndexParameters( ).Length > 0 ) {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }   // ifDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }   // foreachDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return propertyInfo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2399190Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<T> Get(Expression<Func<T, bool>> condition)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (condition.Body.NodeType == ExpressionType.Equal)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var equalityExpression = ((BinaryExpression)condition.Body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var column = ((MemberExpression)equalityExpression.Left).Member.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var value = ((ConstantExpression)equalityExpression.Right).Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var table = typeof(T).Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sql = string.Format("select * from {0} where {1} = '{2}'", table, column, value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ExecuteSelect(sql);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Enumerable.Empty<T>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

WriteExcelStyledCell(object value, CellStyle style)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_writer == null) throw new NotSupportedException("Cannot write after closing.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _writer.WriteStartElement("Cell", "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:spreadsheet");Di2015NewLine        _writer.WriteAttributeString("StyleID", "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:spreadsheet", style.ToString());Di2015NewLine        _writer.WriteStartElement("Data", "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:spreadsheet");Di2015NewLine        switch (style)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case CellStyle.General:Di2015NewLine                _writer.WriteAttributeString("Type", "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:spreadsheet", "String");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case CellStyle.Number:Di2015NewLine            case CellStyle.Currency:Di2015NewLine                _writer.WriteAttributeString("Type", "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:spreadsheet", _writer.WriteAttributeString("Type", "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:spreadsheet", "DateTime");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _writer.WriteValue(value);Di2015NewLine        //  tag += String.Format("{1}\\"><ss:Data ss:Type=\\"DateTime\\">{0:yyyy\\\\-MM\\\\-dd\\\\THH\\\\:mm\\\\:ss\\\\.fff}</ss:Data>", WriteExcelAutoStyledCell(object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_writer == null) throw new NotSupportedException("Cannot write after closing.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //write the <ss:Cell> and <ss:Data> tags for somethingDi2015NewLine        if (value is Int16 || value is Int32 || value is Int64 || value is SByte ||Di2015NewLine            value is UInt16 || value is UInt32 || value is UInt64 || value is Byte)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WriteExcelStyledCell(value, CellStyle.Number);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (value is Single || value is Double || value is Decimal) //we'll assume it's a currencyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WriteExcelStyledCell(value, CellStyle.Currency);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (value is DateTime)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //check if there's no time information and use the appropriate styleDi2015NewLine            WriteExcelStyledCell(value, ((DateTime)value).TimeOfDay.CompareTo(new TimeSpan(0, 0, 0, 0, 0)) == 0 ? CellStyle.ShortDate : CellStyle.DateTime);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WriteExcelStyledCell(value, CellStyle.General);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region IDisposable MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_writer == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _writer.Close();Di2015NewLine        _writer = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

           //write dataDi2015NewLine                    foreach (DataRow row in data.Rows)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        writer.WriteStartRow();Di2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                                writer.WriteExcelAutoStyledCell(o);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                        openFileDialog.FileName = fileName;Di2015NewLine                        //openFileDialog.ShowDialog();Di2015NewLine 2401736Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static String[] findWords(params string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (args.Count() == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new String[] { "" };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String[] oldWords = findWords(args.Skip(1).ToArray());Di2015NewLine            String[] newWords = oldWords.Where(word => word == "" || word.Split(new String[] { " " }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries)[0] == args[1])Di2015NewLine                                        .Select(word => (args[0] + " " + word).Trim()).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return oldWords.Union(newWords).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

2408084Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<string> GetSubdirectoriesContainingOnlyFiles(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return from subdirectory in Directory.GetDirectories(path, "*", SearchOption.AllDirectories)Di2015NewLine         where Directory.GetDirectories(subdirectory).Length == 0Di2015NewLine        select subdirectory;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2408248Di2015UniqueSeparator    internal static Expression<Func<TModel, T>> GenExpressionByClause<TModel, T>(string column)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var columnPropInfo = typeof(TModel).GetProperty(column);Di2015NewLine        var formatMethod = typeof (string).GetMethod("Format", new[] {typeof (string), typeof (object)});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var entityParam = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TModel), "e");Di2015NewLine        var columnExpr = Expression.MakeMemberAccess(entityParam, columnPropInfo);Di2015NewLine        var formatCall = Expression.Call( formatMethod, Expression.Constant("{0}"), columnExpr);Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda(formatCall , entityParam) as Expression<Func<TModel, T>>;Di2015NewLine        return lambda;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2409064Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DiacritMergerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static readonly Dictionary<char, char> _lookup = new Dictionary<char, char>Di2015NewLine                         {Di2015NewLine                             {'\\'', '\\u0301'},Di2015NewLine                             {'"', '\\u0308'}Di2015NewLine                         };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Merge(string asciiBase, string diacrits)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var combined = asciiBase.Zip(diacrits, (ascii, diacrit) => DiacritVersion(diacrit, ascii));Di2015NewLine        return new string(combined.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static char DiacritVersion(char diacrit, char character)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char combine;Di2015NewLine        return _lookup.TryGetValue(diacrit, out combine) ? new string(new [] {character, combine}).Normalize()[0] : character;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2417120Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.Serialization;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static T Clone<T>(T obj) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var serializer = new DataContractSerializer(typeof(T), null, int.MaxValue, false, true, null);Di2015NewLine        using (var ms = new System.IO.MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            serializer.WriteObject(ms, obj);Di2015NewLine            ms.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine            return (T)serializer.ReadObject(ms);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Foo foo = new Foo();Di2015NewLine        Bar bar = new Bar();Di2015NewLine        foo.Bar = bar;Di2015NewLine        bar.Foo = foo; // nice cyclic graphDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Foo clone = Clone(foo);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(foo != clone); //true - new objectDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(clone.Bar.Foo == clone); // true; copied graphDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine[DataContract]Di2015NewLineclass FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [DataMember]Di2015NewLine    public Bar Bar { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine[DataContract]Di2015NewLineclass BarDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [DataMember]Di2015NewLine    public Foo Foo { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2417736Di2015UniqueSeparator// forgive the mangled code; I hate horizontal scrollingDi2015NewLinepublic sealed class ToStringBuilder<T> {Di2015NewLine    private T _obj;Di2015NewLine    private Type _objType;Di2015NewLine    private StringBuilder _innerSb;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ToStringBuilder(T obj) {Di2015NewLine        _obj = obj;Di2015NewLine        _objType = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine        _innerSb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ToStringBuilder<T> Append<TProperty>Di2015NewLine    (Expression<Func<T, TProperty>> expression) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string propertyName;Di2015NewLine        if (!TryGetPropertyName(expression, out propertyName))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine                "Expression must be a simple property expression."Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Func<T, TProperty> func = expression.Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_innerSb.Length < 1)Di2015NewLine            _innerSb.Append(Di2015NewLine                propertyName + ": " + func(_obj).ToString()Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            _innerSb.Append(Di2015NewLine                ", " + propertyName + ": " + func(_obj).ToString()Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool TryGetPropertyName<TProperty>Di2015NewLine    (Expression<Func<T, TProperty>> expression, out string propertyName) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        propertyName = default(string);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var propertyExpression = expression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (propertyExpression == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        propertyName = propertyExpression.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString() {Di2015NewLine        return _objType.Name + "{" + _innerSb.ToString() + "}";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

where sys.objects.name='{0}' and sys.objects.type = 'U' and sys.triggers.parent_id = sys.objects.object_id";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private DbSyncScopeDescription syncScopeDescription;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SqlSyncTriggerHelper(DbSyncScopeDescription syncScopeDescription)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.syncScopeDescription = syncScopeDescription;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Apply(SqlConnection conn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SqlTransaction transaction = null;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (conn.State == System.Data.ConnectionState.Closed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                conn.Open();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            transaction = conn.BeginTransaction();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var table in syncScopeDescription.Tables)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (string trigger in GetTriggers(table.UnquotedLocalName, conn, transaction))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    AlterTrigger(trigger, conn, transaction);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            transaction.Commit();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (transaction != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                transaction.Rollback();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (transaction != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                transaction.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            conn.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AlterTrigger(string trigger, SqlConnection conn, SqlTransaction transaction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SqlCommand newCmd = new SqlCommand(string.Format("exec sp_helptext '{0}'", trigger), conn, transaction);Di2015NewLine        var triggerStringBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = newCmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                triggerStringBuilder.Append(reader.GetValue(0) as string);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var triggerString = triggerStringBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLine        triggerString = triggerString.Replace("CREATE TRIGGER", "ALTER TRIGGER").Replace(" AS\\n", " AS\\nSET NOCOUNT ON\\n") + "\\nSET NOCOUNT OFF";Di2015NewLine        var alterTriggerCommand = new SqlCommand(triggerString, conn, transaction);Di2015NewLine        alterTriggerCommand.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<string> GetTriggers(string tableName, SqlConnection conn, SqlTransaction transaction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var resultList = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        var command = new SqlCommand(string.Format(triggerSql, tableName), conn, transaction);Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = command.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                resultList.Add(reader.GetString(0));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return resultList;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If response is there use it, else add it Di2015NewLine        if (transReq.TransactionResponse == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TransactionResponse transactionResponse = new TransactionResponse();Di2015NewLine            transReq.TransactionResponse = transactionResponse; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If response/errors are there, use them, else add them  Di2015NewLine        if (transReq.TransactionResponse.Status == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Status status = new Status();Di2015NewLine            transReq.TransactionResponse.Status = status; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // If response/errors are there, use them, else add them  Di2015NewLine        if (transReq.TransactionResponse.Status.Errors == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StatusError[] errors = new StatusError[1];Di2015NewLine            errors[0] = new StatusError();Di2015NewLine            intErrSubscript = 0;Di2015NewLine            transReq.TransactionResponse.Status.Errors = errors;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int newArraySize = transReq.TransactionResponse.Status.Errors.Length + 1;Di2015NewLine            intErrSubscript = newArraySize - 1;Di2015NewLine            StatusError[] errors = transReq.TransactionResponse.Status.Errors;Di2015NewLine            Array.Resize<StatusError> (ref errors,  newArraySize);Di2015NewLine            transReq.TransactionResponse.Status.Errors = errors; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        transReq.TransactionResponse.Status.Errors[intErrSubscript] = newErr;Di2015NewLine        return transReq; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2422859Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic virtual TreeType Insert(T value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Func<TreeType, T, TreeType, TreeType> nodeFunc = (l, x, r) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int compare = this.Comparer(value, x);Di2015NewLine        if (compare < 0) { return CreateNode(l.Insert(value), x, r); }Di2015NewLine        else if (compare > 0) { return CreateNode(l, x, r.Insert(value)); }Di2015NewLine        return Self();Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    return Insert<TreeType>(value, nodeFunc);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate TreeType Insert<U>(T value, Di2015NewLine    Func<TreeType, T, TreeType, TreeType> nodeFunc)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return this.Match<TreeType>(Di2015NewLine        () => CreateNode(Self(), value, Self()),Di2015NewLine        nodeFunc);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2422859Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic virtual TreeType Insert(T value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Func<TreeType> nilFunc = () => CreateNode(Self(), value, Self());Di2015NewLine    Func<TreeType, T, TreeType, TreeType> nodeFunc = (l, x, r) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int compare = this.Comparer(value, x);Di2015NewLine        if (compare < 0) { return CreateNode(l.Insert(value), x, r); }Di2015NewLine        else if (compare > 0) { return CreateNode(l, x, r.Insert(value)); }Di2015NewLine        return Self();Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    return Insert<TreeType>(value, nilFunc, nodeFunc);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate TreeType Insert<U>(T value, Func<TreeType> nilFunc,Di2015NewLine    Func<TreeType, T, TreeType, TreeType> nodeFunc)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return this.Match<TreeType>(nilFunc, nodeFunc);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2422859Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected class InserterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private TreeType tree;Di2015NewLine    private Func<TreeType> nilFunc;Di2015NewLine    private Func<TreeType, T, TreeType, TreeType> nodeFunc;Di2015NewLine    private T value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Inserter(T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.nilFunc = () => CreateNode();Di2015NewLine        this.nodeFunc = (l, x, r) => PerformMatch(l, x, r);Di2015NewLine        this.value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TreeType Insert(TreeType parent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.tree = parent;Di2015NewLine        return tree.Match<TreeType>(nilFunc, nodeFunc);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private TreeType CreateNode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return tree.CreateNode(tree, value, tree);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private TreeType PerformMatch(TreeType l, T x, TreeType r)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int compare = tree.Comparer(value, x);Di2015NewLine        if (compare < 0) { return tree.CreateNode(l.Insert(value, this), x, r); }Di2015NewLine        else if (compare > 0) { return tree.CreateNode(l, x, r.Insert(value, this)); }Di2015NewLine        return tree;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2428367Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Dictionary<string, List<string>> _graphDi2015NewLinepublic void ConstructGraph()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (_graph == null) {Di2015NewLine        _graph = new Dictionary<string, List<string>>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var rate in rates) {Di2015NewLine            if (!_graph.ContainsKey(rate.Base))Di2015NewLine                _graph[rate.Base] = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            if (!_graph.ContainsKey(rate.Target))Di2015NewLine                _graph[rate.Target] = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _graph[rate.Base].Add(rate.Target);Di2015NewLine            _graph[rate.Target].Add(rate.Base);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2428367Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic double Rate(string baseCode, string targetCode)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (_graph[baseCode].Contains(targetCode)) {Di2015NewLine        // found the target codeDi2015NewLine        return GetKnownRate(baseCode, targetCode);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var code in _graph[baseCode]) {Di2015NewLine            // determine if code can be converted to targetCodeDi2015NewLine            double rate = Rate(code, targetCode);Di2015NewLine            if (rate != 0) // if it can than combine with returned rateDi2015NewLine                return rate * GetKnownRate(baseCode, code);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return 0; // baseCode cannot be converted to the targetCodeDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic double GetKnownRate(string baseCode, string targetCode) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var rate = rates.SingleOrDefault(fr => fr.Base == baseCode && fr.Target == targetCode);Di2015NewLine    var rate_i rates.SingleOrDefault(fr => fr.Base == targetCode && fr.Target == baseCode));Di2015NewLine    if (rate == null)Di2015NewLine        return 1 / rate_i.RateDi2015NewLine    return rate.Rate;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2430274Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string BytesToString(byte[] data) {Di2015NewLine    // Minimum length 1.Di2015NewLine    if (data.Length == 0) return "0";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // length <= digits.Length.Di2015NewLine    var digits = new byte[(data.Length * 0x00026882/* (int)(Math.Log(2, 10) * 0x80000) */ + 0xFFFF) >> 16];Di2015NewLine    int length = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // For each byte:Di2015NewLine    for (int j = 0; j != data.Length; ++j) {Di2015NewLine        // digits = digits * 256 + data[j].Di2015NewLine        int i, carry = data[j];Di2015NewLine        for (i = 0; i < length || carry != 0; ++i) {Di2015NewLine            int value = digits[i] * 256 + carry;Di2015NewLine            carry = Math.DivRem(value, 10, out value);Di2015NewLine            digits[i] = (byte)value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // digits got longer.Di2015NewLine        if (i > length) length = i;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return string.Di2015NewLine    var result = new StringBuilder(length);Di2015NewLine    while (0 != length) result.Append((char)('0' + digits[--length]));Di2015NewLine    return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2431934Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static DataTable[] ParseAllTables(HtmlDocument doc)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<DataTable>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var table in doc.DocumentNode.Descendants("table"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result.Add(ParseTable(table));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static DataTable ParseTable(HtmlNode table)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var rows = table.Descendants("tr");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var header = rows.Take(1).First();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var column in header.Descendants("td"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result.Columns.Add(new DataColumn(column.InnerText, typeof(string)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var row in rows.Skip(1))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var data = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var column in row.Descendants("td"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            data.Add(column.InnerText);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        result.Rows.Add(data.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2432482Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Point { double x, y; } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedouble PolygonArea(Point[] polygon)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   int i,j;Di2015NewLine   double area = 0; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   for (i=0; i < polygon.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine      j = (i + 1) % polygon.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      area += polygon[i].x * polygon[j].y;Di2015NewLine      area -= polygon[i].y * polygon[j].x;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   area /= 2;Di2015NewLine   return (area < 0 ? -area : area);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2434231Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class UtilitiesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Image CaptureScreen()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return CaptureWindow(User32.GetDesktopWindow());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Image CaptureWindow(IntPtr handle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IntPtr hdcSrc = User32.GetWindowDC(handle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RECT windowRect = new RECT();Di2015NewLine        User32.GetWindowRect(handle, ref windowRect);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int width = windowRect.right - windowRect.left;Di2015NewLine        int height = windowRect.bottom - windowRect.top;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IntPtr hdcDest = Gdi32.CreateCompatibleDC(hdcSrc);Di2015NewLine        IntPtr hBitmap = Gdi32.CreateCompatibleBitmap(hdcSrc, width, height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IntPtr hOld = Gdi32.SelectObject(hdcDest, hBitmap);Di2015NewLine        Gdi32.BitBlt(hdcDest, 0, 0, width, height, hdcSrc, 0, 0, ApiConstants.SRCCOPY);Di2015NewLine        Gdi32.SelectObject(hdcDest, hOld);Di2015NewLine        Gdi32.DeleteDC(hdcDest);Di2015NewLine        User32.ReleaseDC(handle, hdcSrc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Image image = Image.FromHbitmap(hBitmap);Di2015NewLine        Gdi32.DeleteObject(hBitmap);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return image;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// HtmlHelper Extension methods for building a divDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class
